168b1(1): de'i rnam par 'grol pa mthong ba'i phyir nam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa ste/ des pa rigs kyi bu chos bzhi thos nga ldan na// de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthod pa yin no// de nas bcom/ 
168b2(1): ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas// rang panye rgyal po ltar 'khor sa dang bcas te bar snang la gshegs so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ 
168b3(1): rigs kyi bu des pa la 'di skad ces smras so// des pa khyod napa de bzhin gshegs pa la lta bar 'gro ba 'i de'i tshe kho bo la yang sbron cig dang / ma tha yang de bzhin gshegs pa la lta 'gro'o// des pas sprul pa/ rgyal po chen po de spang
168b4(1): bkye'o// bdag ni khyod bud byed dang // gzhon nu dang / blon po la sogs pa'i 'khor dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gzigs su gshegs par 'tshal lo// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag gcig du
168b5(1): la phan pa'i phyir bzhugs pa ma legs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dani 'khor pal chen mdzes so// rgyal pos smras pa// nges pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gang yin// des pas smras pa/ rgyal chen
168b6(1): po yongs su sbyind par bgyid pa dang / gdul ba'i slad du sems canathams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khod lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhan yin theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa ma mchis pa'i
168b7(1): slad du gzhan dag kyang byang chub yang dag par 'dzind tu 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can g.yo can 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni
168b8(1): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po phyed myi zlogs par 'gyur ba'i 'dun pa drag po ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can ser sna can yongs su smind par brtse
168b9(1): bar 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can tshul khrims 'chald pa yongs su smind par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags pa
168b10(1): rgyal po chen po sems can gnod sems can yongs su sbyin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can le lo can yongs su sbyind par bgyid par 'gyur
169a1(1): ba'i bathon 'grus ni byang chub so bos dpa' 'khod lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can sems rnam par g.yengs pa yongs su sbyind par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
169a2(1): lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can 'cham pa'i shes rab can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i shes rab ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad sems snyoms pa'i byams
169a3(1): ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po 'khor pa las yongs su myi skyo ba'i snying rerje ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa'i dga' ba ni
169a4(1): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong ba'i gtang snyoms ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad yongs su smi nad par bgyid pa
169a5(1): 'gyur ba'i bsdu' ba'i dngos po bzhi/ po dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor hUM lags so// rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams pa sna tshogs sogs pa ni byang
169a6(1): chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po bdud kyi las thos/ cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa pa dang / smond pa myed pa rnams ni byang chub sems
169a7(1): dpa'i 'khod lags so// rgyal po chen po tshig btsun par 'gyur ba'i bden ba dang myi brtsub pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po spobs pa phun gsum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i myi 'phya ba
169a8(1): dang / thaMd slad myi bgyid pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po brjed ngas par myi 'gyur ba'i thos pa'i yo byad sogs pa'i ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po thos par
169a9(1): 'dzind par 'gyur ba'i slad du slob dpon dang mkhan po la gus pa ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur ba'i thos pa 'dzind pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'cho
169a10(1): lags so// rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad kyi bstand pa yang dag par 'a'adzind par 'gyur ba'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba zhes
169b1(1): cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i dkon lnga gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// rgyal po chen po sems can ma dad pa dad par 'gyur ba'i 'tsho ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ba'i ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lag mo
169b2(1): rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos grub par 'gyur ba'i bag yod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal dga' zhing gul la yid rangs ste rab tu dga' zhing / dga' ba dang yid bde ba
169b3(1): skyes nas// rgyal po la 'os pa'i ras bcos bu zung stong chos la dga' ba'i phyir des pa la byin no// des pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag la bkur ster dang / mchod pa mdzad pas 'tshal to// gang gis bdag la 'tshal
169b4(1): bar 'gyur ba'i gos ras rulnga pa'i dum bu'i brgya brtsams pa bdag la mchis kyis/ bdag ni bdag gir 'dzi nad pa dang bcas shing yongs su 'dzind pa dang bcas pa'i gos rnams mye 'tshal to// rgyal po chen po dpyid kyi rus na ras rul
169b5(1): ba'i dus bu'i gos 'di shing gyi yal ga la bkal te/ dgung gcig gam/ dgung gnyis sam/ dgung bcu la 'am// dgur brgyar mchis kyang / de la su yang lend pa ma mchis shing de su la yang chags pa'i sems
169b6(1): byed pa te/ bdag kyang ni po nas bye bska pa mi 'i rgya de kyimargya mtshan po bdanan nag gang 'dzin pa dang / yongs su 'di pa dad bcas pa gos mas kyi 'ja po/ rgya ba ma po byang du rnam
169b7(1): dpa' ni gang la bdag nyid kyang 'dod pa spong bar 'gyur zhing // gzhan yang 'dod pa'i sems skyed par myi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni gos bcad par bgyi'o// rgyal pos smras pa// nges pa gal te de ltar ras bcos bu zub 'di dag khyod myi len na
169b8(1): kho bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rkang pas brdzes shig// des pas lha de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras nas// nas bcos bu zung de dag la rkang pas brdzes te song ngo // rgyal pos spras pa/ des pa ras bcos bu zung khyod kyi rkang pa'i sman
169b9(1): mar gyudad pa 'di rnams ji ltar bya/ des pas smras pa// rgyal po chen po sems can dbul po gcer po gos mchis pa gang lags pa de dag la gsol cig/ rgyal pos nges pas de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/ rgyal po'i myi rnams
169b10(1): bsgos te/ de dag gis kyang ji skad bsgos pa bzhin du byas so// ras bcos bu zur de dag dbul lo de dag gis bgos ma thag tu 'di snyam du sems bskyed de/ bdag cag gis des pa la ji ltar lan glan par bya snyam pa las/ sangs rgyas kyi
170a1(1): byin gyi rlabs dang / des pa'i smon lam gi stobs kyis de dag gis par snang las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos so// 'dod pa bzhin du lan ni glan bya ba/ mye tog dang ni spos dang byug pa dang
170a2(1): zas pa nom nor rnams kyis kyang byi nus te/ byang chub sems kyis nges pa dga' bar 'gyur// des pa gos dang zas 'dod ma yin te// rnyed dang bkur bsti grags pa 'dod ma yin// des pa byang chub sems las chos 'dod de/ 
170a3(1): byang chub sems kyis nges pa dga' ba skyes// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rigs kyi bu des pa dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gnyen yod kyi skyes pa dang / 
170a4(1): bud byed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / srog chags brgya phrag mang po dag/ bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir dong ngo // de nas mnyan yod dang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal gyi bar du lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'khor gyi khyams chen po bkra ba
170a5(1): blta na sdug pa/ yangs shing mtho la brgyan thams cad kyis brgya nad pa 'di lta ste dper na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba lta bu zhig srul da te/ dbus su shing yongs su sa brtog
170a6(1): yul to/ yongs sus btos kyi drung du yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnaseng ge'i khri bkra ba/ blta na sdug cing chu zheng gab pa la swA/ le ras be cos bu brgya stong du ma gting ba mngon par skul to// 
170a7(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bstan drug khri dag kyang mngon par skul to// lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs la tshogs pa lha'i bu mo khri gnyis stong yang mye tog dang / gdug pa dang / spos dang / mye tog 'phreng ba dang / 
170a8(1): byug pa dang / lha'i can dan gyi bye ma dag khyer nas sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa dag byed cing / des bu'i g.yog bya ba'i phyi bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri brgyand par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i chog
170a9(1): chen po de dag 'ong bar thugs su chud nas/ gtsug khang nas byung ste// byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis yongs su bskor da cing gnan pa shams pa la zhugs so// de nas dri za'i bu gtsug bud lnga pas lnga'o/ 
170a10(1): bra mo gnyi 'od la smras pa// bzang po chur shog/ nges pa'i grwa yog bya ba'i phyir chud kyi sgra dang / glu'i sgra dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya'o// de nas lnga'i bu bu mo gnyi 'od kyis lnga'i bu zo sde
170b1(1): brgya tsam dang tha brag cig tu rgyud kyi sgra s+pha rad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bstod pa// khyod kyis bskal da pa brgyar ni sngan cad dka' thub s+yad// khyod ni bsdu pa dag dang sprin dang dul la dgyes// khyod ni skra gsung thugs
170b2(1): nams yongs su dag pa ste// srid gsum 'jig rten bla ya ni bdag phyag 'tshal// khyod ni zab kyi mnga' bzod dang byams la dgyes// khyod ni brtson 'grus brtan dang stobs kyis pha rold gshegs// khyod ni bsam
170b3(1): gtan blo dang tshul rnams snang la dgyes// dri ma gsum gyis nyes pa sel da la bdag phyag mtshal// khyod ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug se lad la dgyes// khyod ni thugs ni zhi zhing snyoms la thugs rjed ldan// khyod ni yang
170b4(1): dag gsung zhing dam pa'i don yang mkhyend// srid pa gsum po tha dad par mdzad la bdag phyag 'tshal// khyod ni mthong ba rnams kyi the tsom gseld par mdzad// khyod ni mthong ba rnams kyi skyon rnams mtha' dag gsel do// 
170b5(1): khyod ni mthong ba rnams la mchog tu dga' bar mdzad// bdag ni rgyal ba srog gis skyabs su mchi par bgyi// lha'i bu mo mchog ni / 'dod chags chags gyurd pa// gang gis mthong ba de yang chos la
170b6(1): dga' bar 'gyur/ dga' ba dran bzhin du rgya chen thob 'gyur te/ dga' bas sdug la 'dod pa'i dka' dang bral bar 'gyur/  na mchog sum bcu rtsa gnyis dag gi brgyan rnams kyis// legs pa
170b7(1): brgyan la gsal ba'i yon tan mchog mnga' ba// gsung mchog myi'i dam pa gsung ni rnam par dag/ mtshungs myed pa'i 'od mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa 'dzam bu'i chu'i gser mdog phyag mthil stun
170b8(1): thub pa'i sku bstod ed ge 'dra zhing glang chen stabs// smin tshugs legs shing shangs/ legs tshems snyoms mdzes// dpal gyi snying po shag kya thub mchog khyod la bdud// rgyal ba yon tan brgya phrag dag gis rgyas
170b9(1): gyurard pa// bde gshegs shi nad tu dga' ba skyed mdzad bstod pa'i// bsod nams yon tan mtha' yas sgrub pa gang lags la// de'is 'dir ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas mnyam gyurd cig/ de nas rigs kyi bu des pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag gis
170b10(1): yongs su bskord nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rigs kyis bu nges pa la khri'u bstan bzang po
171a1(1): bdag nyid kyis byid te/ 'di la 'jug shig ces byas nas// rigs kyi bu des pa khri'u stan bzang po de la 'dug go// rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa yang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nams A ban 'om bya
171a2(1): 'chal nas// rang na gyi stan la 'khod do// de na rigs kyi bu gang dag gis nges pa sngon ma mthong ba de dag 'di skad du/ dbul po gos nad pa gyon pa 'di la 'di lta bur mchod byed do zhes 'dzerd to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
171a3(1): byin gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag 'di la brnyas par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di yon tan gyi che ba ji snyed dang ldan pa de ni kho bo'i mngon sum du gyu rad ho// grogs po dag khyed re shig sdod cig/ 
171a4(1): dang / rigs kyi bu 'di'i yon tan gyi bkod pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs kyi bu des pas lha'i bu de dag gi bsam rtogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can
171a5(1): yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i bkod pa'i thabs dang / ye shes kyi bkod/ da pa'i thabs bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od byung ste/ 'od des nges pa'i lus la reg pa
171a6(1): nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyi gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa ce 'dra ba de lta 'bum gyurd pas kyang ches lhag par 'gyurd to// de nas lha'i bu/ de dag ya mtshan du 'dzind par 'gyur te// des pa la mye tog dag gis/ 
171a7(1): gtor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu des pa la bka' ma lad pa// des pa gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje lta bu'i mthu la gnas pa'i tshe yang / sems can yongs su sbyin par bya' ba'i phyir dman par ston cing
171a8(1): dben pa'i blam la gnas kyang / sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i phyir mchog tu bstond par byed pa'i 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no// ye shes la gnas kyang dbye shes par ston cing / phyi shes par ston kyang shes par snang ba'i dani
171a9(1): de'i bkod pa yin no// ye shes pa thob pa rnams la yang lus kyi spyod pa dang / spyod lam gyis dad pa bskyed par byed cing / ye shes thob pa rnams la yang spyod pa thams cad yang dag par stonod pas// brdzu 'phrul stond par byed pa 'di
171a10(1): ni de'i bkod pa yin no// rtag tu sems la dbang byed pasu ngan cing dbul bar bston kyang tshangs pas mchod pa dang / mchog gi bkod pa la gnas skye bo phal gyis kyang mchod pa 'ad ni de'i bkod pa yin no// sems can bsdu ba'i byed ngan
171b1(1): cing dbul bar yang nye bar tond la// sems can rnams la mngon par 'byung ba bskyed pa'i phyir longs spyod pargya chen po dang ldan pa yang / mngon par 'byung ba stond pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
171b2(1): ba kun dka' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu des pas ci srid cig nas byang chub kyi phyir skyed par bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sasad pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu nges pa ni sangs rgyab bye
171b3(1): pa mang po la bsnyend bkur byas pa// sngon gyi tshul phun gsum tshogs pa// bzod pa gsum thob pa// spobs pa thob pa/ mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse ba byas pa// sems can yongs su smind par bya ba la mkhas pa ste// ngan cing dbul bas
171b4(1): sems can rnams 'dul bar byed de// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das 'dis ngan cing dbul ba 'dis sems can ci snyed cig btul lags// bcom ldan 'das gyis bka' sa lad pa// kun dga' bo 'alha'i bu 'bum phrag mang po dag blan
171b5(1): byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi yongs su smind par bya ste/ myin rnams de dang 'dra'o// kun dga' bos gsold pa// bcom ldan 'das/ ci srid cig na ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par/ 
171b6(1): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// 'di'i sangs rgyas kyis zhing gi bkod pa rnams ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur// mying ni ci skad ces bgyi ba zhig tu 'gyur lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
171b7(1): latshigs su bcad de bka' sa lad pa// sems can don la btan zhing brtul zhugs brtan pa dang // grags chen rgya chen dag gis bsam pa khyab byas dang // byang chub yon tan gnas pa'i spyod pa ci 'dra ba// ngas ni khyod la
171b8(1): bshad kyis kun dga' khyod nyon cig/ 'di ni rgyal ba mchod pa mchog phyir ni gus byed cing // dam pa'i chos de bsrung phyir rab tu brtson par byed pa// des pa yi mi spyod pa'i rnam par gang yin pa// de dag 'dir ni 'grang bar nus par
171b9(1): phyir 'gyur ro// pha rolo phyind 'di dag la legs par bslabs// mngon par shes pa dag gis sngan chad rtse ba byas// tshangs pa'i gnas rnams kyis ni mtha' mar phyind par song // thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa dag la legs
171b10(1): par bslabs// 'dir ni de'i sa 'dul byas skyon rnams legs par mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub kyang ni mngon gsum gyurd par byas// 'dis ni sems can ji lta ji ltar thar 'gyur ba'i// rnam par smind pa'i mtshan nyid la yang
172a1(1): legs par bslab sa// 'jigs pa byed cing blo dang rtogs dang dran dang ldam// spobs rnapa ni gzung ba rnams dang yang ldan pa ste// bdud kyi lugs kyi nyon mongs rdzas las nges byung zhing // sangs rgyas 'apyod yul
172a2(1): don chen sa ni bar tu gnas// 'jig rten chos rnams mang po dag gis ma gos la// chags pa la matogs rnams kyis brag rgya ltar yod myi g.yo'o// su'i drung du myi 'gro rig par byed pa'ang myed// nam mkha' lta bur bcing ba
172a3(1): dang grol ba byed pa yid// snying rjer gnas shing sems kyang yongs su skyob myed// shin tu bsdams shing nem nur can la byams sems ldan// sems can kun la bdag dang 'dra bar sdug par lta// skyon la myi lta
172a4(1): 'khrul pa dag dang ldan ma yin// ji ltar bstand pa bzhin du bsgrub pa rnams la gnas// 'di ni ji skad smras pa/ bzhin du dpyod par byed// chos nyid la ni chos kyi tshul gyis legs par bslabs// stong pa
172a5(1): la mos shing gnyis las rnam par grol// bzod pa gsum thob skye ba'i/ spyod yul ma yin te// sangs rgyas tshul dang yon tan dag rab tu phye/ gnas// 'di ni 'jig rten gang tu chub myed pa na// der ni skye
172a6(1): po rnam par grol bar byed// sangs rgyas kyis ni sras de gang gnas pa der// de bzhin gshegs papa yul na stongs par ma yin te// de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten ma lus par// ji ltar sangs rgyas bzhin du 'di la
172a7(1): bram par gyis// nga ni mya ngan 'das nas nyams pa'i dus pab che// des pa 'di ni sangs rgyas spyod pa spyad nas kyang // sngon chang gnas mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten khams// kye 'khrugs 'jig rtenan nyid du phying yang 'gro
172a8(1): 'gyur// brtan pa grog chags rnabs la phan pa bya ba dang // ni ge 'byodan pa dag ni yongs su 'chal pa dang // byang chub tu ni sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir// bzlas 'a grangs byed ga sus cu gyud pa spyod par byed
172a9(1): de'i 'og tun na skyob pa rgyal par 'gyur// phying ni 'jig rten rgyal po dbang zhug ces kyang bya// de bzhin gshegs kye 'khrugs pa bya ba'i// zhing dang de'i 'angs nye nang duni mtshungs ma yin// 'dzig rten 'thas de ga
172a10(1): par phrul da pa zhes bya ste// g.yon tan thams cad 'a dang nide ldan par 'gyur ba yin// de'i tshe'i chud me go khri thub par 'gyur// de'i dgen 'dun shin da sum ste grang la las 'das// nyan thos theg pa rnams kyi dge 'dun
172b1(1): par 'gyur// bras cher byung chub don tu brtson pa byas nas su// de dag thams cad ye shes thobs dang 'phrul dang // nas pa mas pa yangs ldan na sra pa byed pa// gcin ma pa tsha ba ni legs par
172b2(1): ma kyis// 'di rten pa sa nas rnags pas gyu// ded bdud nams myen ci srid par mas pa byed// de dag papa cad yang dag pa rig cenas pan// bad gsheg pa'i 'ayos su mya ngan 'das 'gyu ras
172b3(1): bani thun bcu dgasam pazhi na rnams su yang / de'adas pa ma pa 'i tu spyod par 'gyur/ de'i man nanas kyi rgyas ni 'khrugs pa byed pa/ des pa na sas gang dag yongs su skyed byas sa/ de dag byang chub blan byed pa'i ros tu spyong
172b4(1): sem nag srung bar 'gyur ba rnabs// de dag thams sa byon de rnams dang debral ba yin/ ga bsod ldan 'das kyis men kyi da bu des pa'i lung bskrad pa bshad ma panas/ denasade'am thor su
172b5(1): zung dan po'i 'jig nyid kyi byams nas sa nag sun mam te/ sna'i rtsecig dang / phye ma dang / gob dang / rkyen gyi rdu yadam na/ bar bam 'o// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khod kyis kyang / 
172b6(1): ge gos rnams kyis rigs kyi bu des pa la bkab bo// tshong dpod dang / khyim bdag dang / bram ze rgya phrag mang po dag kyang rab tu byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la nges pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag

177a8(1): khya bye gcang pa zag pa ste/ myi gcang bar brtag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' lus yang dag pa ma yin pa ste/ sgyu ma lta bur btag par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' bus skye bo kyi maras 'byes pas ba'i rdzu

185b1(1): zan po ma pa' rnam la kun tu kyad mdag kun tu spyod pa de dag dang lda pa'i skyes pa ning na song rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po bung byed kyi dbang du mngon sa 'dod pa stend cing ngan 'grong 'gro bar yang
185b2(1): ba de ni ka skyes pa'i skyes bu'i spyod dang tho yin no// de nas de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bca pa 'di dag bka' sa yang to// 'dod pa dreng gyi gtsang spang par 'os nang // myi 'thun 'jigs byed byi tag
185b3(1): las 'byung sdug bsngal byed// don byed phung bar byed cing dben pa yin pas na// mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i skom la ste nad par byed// btsog pas gang ba'i cha ba khung dri ba lta bu dang / mnam par gyurd cing du
185b4(1): pa'i khyi rnams kyi bzhin dang / shi ba dur khrod sa ni shind tu spad pa ltar// de bzhin 'dod pa rnams kyang shind tu spang ba yin// sbrang bu za zhig mthong nas rgyug pa ci 'dra dang / phag ni ngan skyug pa mthong nas rgyug pa ci
185b5(1): 'dra dag/ khyi ni sha'i don tu shen par 'gro ba ltar// de bzhin gyi namakhas bud myed dag la dga' bar byed// grags pa myed cing myi da snyan yon tan 'bri ba dang // de la tshul khrims dab tu
185b6(1): par byed pa dang / mtho ngas nyams shing dmyal ba dag tu ltung bas na// mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i skom la bsten byed// ji ltar sa la sa la'i dug ni zos pa na// lus dag rgyu zhing rmongs
185b7(1): pa skye bar 'gyur ba ltar// de bzhin byis pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i rgyus// rab kyi lus dbyibs ni dug tu myi rig go// ji ltar sgyu ma shi nad tu bslabs pa'i phyi zhig gis// rnam par skul pas sems
185b8(1): can brgya dag dga' byed ltar// de bzhis byis pa bdag la bad par 'do pa nams// 'dod las dga' ba'i rgyu las ngan 'gro rab tu lhung // zas rlom ston mo bzang po tha dad pa dag dag/ sku dro ga

186a2(1): 'di ni byib pa myos shing shin tu rmongs pa rnabs// shel du myi mthong snod pa cho ga yin par sems pa ltar// lam la rnam par rmongs rnams 'dod pa'i mched kyi phyir// rtag tu'i dang gnas 'di ni gya nom yid
186a3(1): zhes 'jedad// gang gi phyir rnam pa sna tshogs las dag myi shes pas// 'gro ba thams cad deb nyabs gus pa yod byin pas// pha dang ma dang pu dang bu mo dag la ni// don gyi mchod pa myi byed gnod pa thon
186a4(1): pa yin// de dag rtag tu bud myed 'dres pa brjod byed cing // de 'dra'i las kyi tshul la/ 'jug par byed// de dag gti mug 'dra ba sdig pa rang sogs shing // ngan song 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i lam
186a5(1): yang sogs par byed// myi rnams de dag der chags bde par 'du shes shing // pha dang ma yang yongs su rab tu spongs parabyed// de dag mchod 'os rnams la mchod par myi byed cing // !

186a10(1): na la byas thal// ram kyi dag gi slod dums yang btsas tha zhing // rab tu kyi 'ab cu lun bzung ba de zla la// de bzhid lugs kyi bu lus 'ab ba za tha zhing // bye do pa 'jigs bu srung 'dapapa dag tu /

195a3(1): pa bsgyud// bro thos parang pos rnas pa/ 'angamadapapa 'a di dung skyed rje/ 'di'i skyes pan zhes bya ba med de dbyigs pa ste/ 'on kyang khyad kyang khyod kyi ma tsho ba byed par du'o// bded pa gang nal bdan mangs
195a4(1): pa'i dru ba de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs para'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i bde pa des bdag skyes par gyur cig/ bu mo blo zlas bzang mo batshig de skad sprub pa thag su de'i mdo la
195a5(1): de'i bud byed kyi dngos po byed par gyur nas skyed par red de/ chos gos ngur smrigs gyon nas des 'di skad du bden pa gang gis bdag par byang chub thob pa nas// dge slong chur shog ces byas pas
195a6(1): rab tu byung bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdud kyang 'byung bar myi 'gyur ba dang / ngan song gyi myingayang myed pa dang / bud myed kyi skyon rnams kyang myed par 'gyur ba'i
195a7(1): bden pa dang bden pa 'tshig des pa dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas/ po srub bsu lon pa'i spyod las kyi 'drab de lta bur byu cig ces byas so// byang chub sems dpa' blo grob pabadrubs cig de skad ces sdus
195a8(1): ma than tu de'i mod la de dge slong bsnyen pa rdzogs nas lo bsum bcu lon pa'i dpyod lam ci 'dra ba de lta bur gyur to// 'jam dpal bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can rnams
195a9(1): kyi lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur dang / bsams pas bza' ba dang / 2 'thung 'grub par 'gyur ba da/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lnga rnams kyi longs spyod ga yongs su spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du
195a10(1): 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi den ngan song gsum yongs su spangs par 'gyur ba dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljond pa dang / rin po che'i dra bas yongs su bskord cing rin po sna bdun gyi bdam dag gis rgya
195b1(1): ma mama' thar breb kyi ma sal byams rgyas bya gang rtse ba yo da sa nam zhing kyi lhag pa de sar bur 'gyur ba'i bden pa'i tshig depa 'tsha 'dagasepapa don can sa 'gyun cig ches byas 'o// de na rgya

195b3(1): nin chen dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ba/ 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka'asaHlad pa na// srog chags bye ba phrag sum bcu bla na byed pa yang
195b4(1): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog pa nyid la yang dag par gnas par gyur da to// lha bye ba phrag brgyad bcu ni chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// 
195b5(1): srog chags rgya stong gis ni ye shes mngon par rtogs par gyurard to// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong byang chub kyi sems las phyir gyi ldog par 'dod pa lnga stong tsam yang byang chub sems dpa'
195b6(1): blo gros bzang po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rtogs shing dge ba'i za ba che ba nyid la mthong nas de dag rang rang gi bla gos bcom ldan 'das kyis sku la gsol te/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
195b7(1): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos nas tshig 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur da cig ces smras so// dge slong de dag gis
196a1(1): rje/ dge ba' rtsa bu bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa zag tu bskald pa dgu bcu'i 'kho pa bstar te bor nas// bla ma byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
196a2(1): phyir gyi ldog par gnas par 'gyur ra to// de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan te// 'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag ni bska la pa bcu gnyis na// bskal pa dri ma byed pa'i 'od ces bya ba la de bzhin
196a3(1): gshegs pa bzod par dka' ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rtend gyi khams 'od zer can du bskal pa gcig la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs/ 
196a4(1): pa spobs pa'i brgya nad zhes bya bar thams cad mying mthun par 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos rnams la rdzu
196a5(1): 'phrul chen po rkyen pa yin no// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'amad rigs kyi bu mo byang chub 'dod pa gang gis bskal pa stong gyi bar du dathabs mkhas pa dang bral bas pha rol tu phyind pa drug la spyad
196a6(1): gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris nas zla ba phyed kyi bar du lan re blags na bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma ni/ bsod nams kyi phung 'di'i brgya'i char yang myi 'bod/ stor kyi cha dang / brgya stong kyi cha da
196a7(1): bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang myi bzod do// 'jam dpal de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la gtan gyis khyed mthun par gyis/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i smon da lam las byus
196a8(1): pa'i mdo 'di lta la bu 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i chus nur ma zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ shod cig/ lhogs shig/ ston da cig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu stond cig/ 'jam dpal dper na 'kho rnam
196a9(1): sbyar pa sa'i rgyal po ji srid du gnas pa de srid du rin po che sna 'dun myed par myi 'gyur la/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po shi na rin po che sna bdun myed par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu zhing 'jig rten
196b1(1): nang sri du byed pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rin po me sna bdun dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos tshul thams zad byed par myi 'bru ba lan/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di myed par gyu rad na dam pa'i chos nub par
196b2(1): 'gyur ro// 'jab dpal rde bas mamado sde rin po che 'di ste bu 'di yi ger bri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / 'chad pa dang // klag pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya che dang ba tu bstand pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
196b3(1): chen po rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o// 'di ni nga'i rjes su bstand pa yin no// phyis 'gyod par gyur da ta re/ 'di ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub 'dod pa la ngas pa stond pa yin no// bcom ldan
196b4(1): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' sa lad nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyudad pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / myi dang / snga ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
196b5(1): 'jig rtend yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag

196b7(1): rgya gang gi mkhan po 'dzin myi tra dang / su ren dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba pan de ye shes las sogs pas// / bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 
196b8(1): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las// le'u gsum bcu gcig pa ste/ gang 'ga'i mchog gi mdo'// bsdu po byed do// 
196b9(1): rgyag skad du// Ar+ya gang god ta ma nas su tra/ bod nad du/ 'phags pa ganga'aga'i mchog gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thabs cad
196b10(1): la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad 'dag gi sa thob pa'i rdus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon byed papa sbyin pa kyi kun dga' ra ban bzhugs te/ gde'i mthong rgya chen po sa na
197a1(1): yod na/ dge bsnyen ma gang ga ni mchog ces bya ba zhig gnas so// de nas dge bsnyen pa gang ga'i mchog mnyan yod nas byud nas// rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chal mgon myed zas sbyid kyi kun dag
197a2(1): ra ba ga la ba der song te phyi nad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tsha lad te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyend bzhin du/ dge
197a3(1): bsnyen ma gang gi'i mchog la/ gang gi la mchog khyod de bzod gang nas 'ongs zhes rmas so// gang ga'i mchog gis g.yo lad pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gis khrul pa la rmas te/ khyod da bzod gang
197a4(1): nas 'ongs shes de skad bgyis nas/ ji skad lan 'debs par 'gyur lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ gang ga'i mchog sru lad pa la ni 'greng ba myed/ 'dug pa myed/ nyal ba myed/ 'ong ba myed
197a5(1): 'gro ba skyed pa 'chi 'pho pa byed/ skye ba myed ma 'di nas 'das so// zhes de/ rdzi zhes stond par 'gyur/ gang ga'i mchog gis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci chos thams cad phrul pa lta bu lags
197a6(1): sam/ bka' maHlad pa/ gang ga'i mchog de bzhin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te/ chos thams cad srul pa lta bu lags na/ gang gi'i mchog khyod da bzod gang nas 'ongs shes ji skad/ 
197a7(1): du rma// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ gang ga'i mchog sru la pa ni dan song du myi 'gro/ mtho ris su myi 'gro/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar myi 'gro na/ ci gang ga'i mchog kyang ngan song du myi 'gro/ 
197a8(1): mtho ris su myi 'gro/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par myi 'gro 'am/ gang 'gi'i mchog gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i mchog sku lad pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan
197a9(1): lags par mthong na ne// dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i mchog ngan song du mchil ba 'am/ mtho ris su mchi ba 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par brtseb ma/ lags so// zhes bdag skul ba dang bsnyun tu ya
197a10(1): kyi rung lags na/ bcos ldan 'das bdag gis ni dge brten pas gang ga'i mjog mul da pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan lags par sa mthong ste/  bcom ldan 'dab de ltang bdag kyis ma mthong da/ dge bsnyen gang gan nas
197b1(1): nathong dus pa'am/ mthongs su ma ba 'am/ yongs su bya ngan las 'das par bachi ba zheb ded gnad par nabya/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags kyis kyang / g.yol ba dang / drob sems dang / bskyod pa dang / spros/ 
197b2(1): pa bcis na 'di snyam cu bdag na song bu 'gro ba 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'o snyam du semam lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dpyid pa ni nams kyang ngan song du mchi ba 'am/ ma sa
197b3(1): grulam pa 'ab/ yongs su mya ngan la ya 'das par mchi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i mchog kyang de lta bu'i dbyings can lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' yal pa/ gang ga'i mchog
197b4(1): khyod yongs su bya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par ma zhugs sas// gso lad pa bcom ldan 'das su zhig gis myi skye ba la rmas te/ khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mazhugs papa zhes de skad pagyis nas
197b5(1): ji skad lan 'debs par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ba lu pa// gang ga'i mchog kyi skye ba zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i cig bla dag sa yin na/ de ci zhig lan 'debs par 'gyur/ 
197b6(1): gang ka'i mchog gis gsosang pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chos thams cad kyi mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs pa lags sam// bka' maHlad pa gang ga'i mchog de bzhin te// chos thams cad ni mya ngan las/ 
197b7(1): 'dam pa dang mtshungs so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs pa lags na/ gang ga'i mchog khyod yongs su myi ngang las 'das pa la yang dag par ma zhugs
197b8(1): mab zhes de ci zhig rmas te/ bcom ldan 'das su zhig gis hrul pa la rmas te/ khyod yongs su dran las 'das pa la yang dag par zhugs sam zhes de skad pabyis na// ci skad lan 'debs par 'gyur lags / bcom
197b9(1): ldan 'das kyis bka' sa la dang/ gang ga'i mchog 'dri ba 'di ni dmyigs pa myed pa'o// gsol pa ci bcom ldan 'das kyis dmyigs pa dang bcas pa'i ma bas mas lags sum// bkalas \u0f7f la pa/ gang ga'i mchog
197b10(1): dri ba 'di ni byig su myed mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'khor 'di ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'dul ba dag yod de/ de dag gi don chen por 'gyur bas dris so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ga'i mchog de bzhin gshegs pas ni coM
198a1(1): nyid ces bya ba yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas na gang de las byung ba'i chos yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa lta ga la zhig yod// gsol da pa// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyid ces

198a3(1): kyis bka' sa lad pa// gang ka'i mchog gang dmyigs pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni gang gi tshe yang dag par sgrub pa de'i tshe yang bsam gyis myi khyab pa nyid myi 'dod/ gang
198a4(1): gi tshe yang dag par gyi sgrub pa de'i tshe yang bsam gyis myi khyab pa nyid myi 'dor ro// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis myi khyab pa la bsam gyis myi khyab pa zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du bsam gyis myi khyab pa la bsam gyis
198a5(1): myi khyab pa zhes bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsaHlad pa gang ga'i mchog chos 'di la sems par thob par bya ba ma yin te// sos dpes thob par bya bar myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'idi
198a6(1): la ni sems nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gang sems las rab tu byung ba'i chos de lha ga la yod/ gang ka'i mchog/ sems myi dmyigs pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i rgyud ces bya'o// bsam gyis myi khyab khu'i rgyud yin pa de ni
198a7(1): thob pa ma yin/ mngon par rtogs pa ma yin/ shes pa ma yin/ mngon gsum du byas byas pa ma yin te/ de ni thob par bya ba ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/

198a9(1): zhal te chos thams can nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gnyen po ma mchis lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs shes btags pa dang // tshong pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes btags
198a10(1): pa dang / phung po rnams dang // zhabs rnams dang / skye mchen rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'khod pa / 
198b1(1): byangad las 'das pa zhes gtags pa cis bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa la da pa/ gang ga'i mchog 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag 'dag ces 'dog pa kyang 'dag gang yang byed dmyigs pa de bzhin du/ gang ka'i mchog
198b2(1): ram gzugs zhes btags te// gzugs gang yang myi dmyigs so// de bzhin du ngas tshor pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang // rnam par shes pa zhes btags te/ rnam par shes pa gang yang myi dbyigs so// phung po rnams dang / 
198b3(1): khabs rnabs dang / skye mjed rnams dang / rten cing 'brel da'ang byung ba dang / zag pa bcas pa dang / zag pa skyed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / nam par byad pa dang / 'khor pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba yang/ 
198b4(1): dab btags te/ byang dalas 'das gang yang gyi dbyigs so// gang ka'i mchog 'di lta ste dper na/ smyig sa rgyal na mu yong myed de phyi dbyigs so// gang ga'i mchog de bzhin sungs gzugs shes bya bar btags kyang gzugs
198b5(1): gang yang byi dbyigs so// ngas tshod dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed/ rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar btags kyang rnam par/  shes pa gang yang myi dmyigs so// phung po rnams dang
198b6(1): khabs rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa dang / kun nasanyon mongs pa dang // rnam par byang ba dang / 'khod pa dang / mya
198b7(1): las 'das pa zhes bya ba ngas btags kyang // don dam par na de dag thams cad kyang myed cing myi dmyigs so// gang ga'i mchog gang chos la mchog tu 'dzind pa myed par tshangs par spyad bapyod pa de lta bu ni legs par gsungs pa'i/ 
198b8(1): chos 'dul ba latshangs par 'apyod pa la gnas pa yin no// gang ga'i mchog mngon pa'i brgyal can gnas dmyigs nas tshangs par byad 'apyod pa de dag gis tshangs par dpyod pa de ni yongs su ma dag pa'o zhes nga smra'o// gang dag changs
198b9(1): par spyod pa de yongs su ma dag pa de dag ni zab mo rgyun chad pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di thos nas sngangs skrag par 'gyur te/ de dag skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na pa dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre bsngags 'dond pa pa dang / sdug
198b10(1): bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrul pa rnams las yongs su myi 'gro la te/ de dag ni sdug bsngal gyi skal pa can tu 'gyur ro zhes nga smra'o// gang ga'i mchog da ltar rabar 'das pa'i phyi na yang rung ste/ gang dag zab ce
199a1(1): tun dad pa 'ad ga su chos pa smon pa de dag / phyi gi mug pa dag la gsod pa po'i 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur te/ de ltar myi ga'i shug pa de dag log par band pas gsad pa'i zhe sdang bskyed da ya ngan sor su gro
199a2(1): par 'gyur ro// gang ga'i mchog gis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das rgyun chad par rgyun chad pa zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad tu rgyun chad pa bgyid// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sartsal pa// gang gi'i mchog chos 'di ni rgyun bcad pa
199a3(1): dngag/ dbye ba 'am/ rnam par gzhig pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir rgyun chad pa zhes bya ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i rgyud ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ba de'i tshe mdzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcon
199a4(1): ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs/ kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang // ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul ki kha dog lta bu dag byung nas// de dag gis 'jig

199a6(1): don sa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bla gos phrag pa gcig tugazard te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lba bas la btsugs nes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo spa rad pa btud de/ bcom ldan
199a7(1): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa myi mdzad na/ mdzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags// rkyend gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa med pa
199a8(1): kun dka' bo ngas mngon par shes te// sa phyogs 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa stong gis gang ga'i mchog ces bya ba'i kho na'i dge bsnyen pa sha stag las bathams te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do// dge bsnyen ma
199a9(1): de dag thams cad ni rab tu byung nas/ phung po myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
199a10(1): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyid ci lags/ 'di de ltang bzung bar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' yan lad pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi nam grangs 'di ni dri ma byed pa zhes bya ste/ 'di dri ma byed pa zhes bya bar zung zhig
199b1(1): chos kyi rnab grangs 'di bstand pa na/ dge slong bdun rgyu dang / dge slong ma bzhi pargya le nad pa myed pas// zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas 'dod pa na dpyod pa dang / gzugs kyi spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis/ 
199b2(1): lha'i mye tog rnams dang / tsan dan gyi phye mas rnams mngon par suthul te/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces 'di ltar grong khyer mnyan yod na dge bsnyen ma 'di lta bu gnas pa la/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dang
199b3(1): lhan gcig smra yang de'i lus ngal bar yang myi 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yang gang ga'i mchog 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la lhag par bya ba byas shing / dge ba'i rtsa bskyed pa dang / yun ring po nas dge' ba spyod pa dang / yun ring po nas
199b4(1): tshangs par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa 'di ni ngo mtsha rad to zhes smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ lha'i bu dag de bzhin te/ 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa
199b5(1): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ yun ring du tshangs par baspyad pa la gnasadapa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' saHlad nas// dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i mchog dang / lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin dang / 
199b6(1): dri zad bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// /  'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam
199b7(1): grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ gang ga'i mchog gis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste// / gsum bcu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs s+ho/ 
199b8(1): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi nam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las// le'u sum bcu gnyis pa ste/ mya ngan myed kyis byin pa lung bstan dA pa/ bam po gcin
199b9(1): rgya gar skad du/ sa h+ya ma sho ka dang ta bya ka ra na/ na ma ma hA yA na su tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa mye ngan myed kyis byin pa lung bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdol// sangs rgyas
199b10(1): dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cadan la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gi sa thos pa'i nus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khabs/ bya nod kyi phung po'i tshal// dge slong rdza brtsamamazhin na slong ga do// 
200a1(1): 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa myed pa/ mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa la mkhas pa// chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa
200a2(1): stong pa nyid la gnas pa// mtshan ma byed pa la gnas pa/ smond pa myed pa la gnas pa// byi dbyigs po lnga gnas pa/ phyi gnas par chos stond pa// byi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa sha stag la 'das ste
200a3(1): byang chub sems dpa' lhun po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes lhun po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin can seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpal seng ge blo gros dang
200a4(1): byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag rgyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag bsgred dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu btub zhing rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub bebs dbu
200a5(1): dbang po las 'das pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag sugadu dang byang chub sems dpa' rin chen sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' da lag na rin cen dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin cen rngon
200a6(1): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' din chen dka' ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'a lo bsrud pa dang / byang chub khebs dpal 'kho bsdu na po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bded pa la gnas pa dang / byang chub
200a7(1): sem pa dpa' bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'ang ba dpal gnon nung gyud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' dkon bachog 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dang 'jug smras da / byang chub
200a8(1): me sa dpa pa dang / byang chub seng dang m+b+ha dang / byang chub se sa dpa'abu blas yangs pa dang / byang chub ses pa dpa' bo klas kyad pa can pa/ byang chub sems dpa'ajog pa 'phe dang /  / 
200a9(1): pa ga sa byang chub se mdas slong du mabs gcegs bzhugs 'o// de na pa de'i sacom ldan 'das rgyam ze'i mam bya grong khye chen po na gnas shing bzhugs pa ya/ rgyal pos skyes dgra dang / 
200a10(1): bsal gzhis padang / bra ga dang / ldan po la gartogs pa dang / nang ba kyin dang / zhabs phre byed pa dang / pho brang la mongs kyi phyidang / zas dang / rgyas sa dang / khyi 'ad nim rgyas kyi dang / 
200b1(1): byas// bla mar byas// ri mor byas/ mchod par byas ste// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khod brgyad stong du mas yongs su bsko rad cing mdund kyis bltas nas chos stond pa 'di lta ste// tshangs par spyod pa// thog mar dge' ba
200b2(1): pabar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba// don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa// yongs su dag pa// yongs su byang ba rab tu stond to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha re dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mye'u dag pa
200b3(1): gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od bsrungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan
200b4(1): zind dang / tshe dang ldan pa nas gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan ma 'gags pa dang / de dag dang gzhan yang nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po rnams snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs bgos nas spung brtse
200b5(1): thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen pod bsod snyoms kyi phyi pa zhugs so// de nas nyan thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por mthar chags su bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing mthar kyis rgyal po ma skyes sgra
200b6(1): 'ibu pho brang ga la ba der dong ste/ lpags nas phyogs gcig tu cang kyi sbra bapa 'khod do// dayang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang na// bu mo/ mye ngan byed kyis byin zhes bya ba btsas nas// lo bcu gnyis lon
200b7(1): pa 'dra ba gzugs bzang ba / mengs pa/ bstan sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan la/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsaphra bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang zas
200b8(1): bsnyen bkur byas pa/ bla na byed pa'i byang chub las phyir gyi ldog pa de rang gi pha'i khang bzangs na khri ser gyi rkang pa can yod pa la 'dug par gyurd to// de nas bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pas/ nyan thos chen po de dag/ 
200b9(1): mthong na ga l+li de las ma langs te/ srung yang myi 'gro/ phyag kyang myi byed/ gtam yang phyi zer/ bstan yang myi 'dings// bsod snyoms kyang myi dbul par kha rog ste 'dug go// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras nyan thos
200b10(1): chen de dag rgyal polalo brang du 'ongs zhes thos nas// rang gi khang bzangs kyi spu 'ang ga la ba der song ste phyind nas// nyan thos chen po de dag la 'chog tu sdug par 'dzind pas pa/ mngon par dga' zhing stan yang bting ngo // rgyas za/ 
201a1(1): pa skyes dgras bu ze byed byed kyis byin pas/ nyan mam chen pa de dag mthos bzhin du ma ga sa 'das par mthong nas/ bum myed na byed kyis byin 'a sa 'di skad ces smras po// bu ma bdi dag ni bcom lda
201a2(1): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de'i nyan thos chen po ste/ che ba' nyid kyis yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ zhur bor ba / bdag gi
201a3(1): gi rdo rjes su thob pang / srid pa kun tu spyod dpa// yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems tu rnam par grol ba/ bsod nams kyi zhing du gyu rad pa/ rnying 'artse ba can yin te/ 'jig rten la snying 'artse ba'i phyi
201a4(1): bsod nams rgya myir gru par khyod kyis phyi shes pam cin/ khyod kyis de dag mthong la mthong bzhin du khrilas kyang kyi ldang / sdu bar yang byi byed ka phyag gyi 'chal/ gtam yang myi zer/ bskrund dang bsod snyoms la yang brgyan gyi 'dren
201a5(1): dad pa dang gus pa yang myi bskyed par/ ci'i phyir mgus pa ston cing kha dog tu dug ste/ khyod kyis dond kyi dbang ci zhig mthong / de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mye ngan myed kyis byin pas rang gi brgyag
201a6(1): po ma skyes dgral 'di skad ces smras so// yab 'di ji snyam du/ dgongs/ ci 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rgyal phran la ldang pa'am cur mami par nam yang ga man tan// gzigs sam// rgyal po
201a7(1): smras pa/ bu mo de ma yin no// bu mos smras pa// yab ci lba'i dbang po rgya byin lha gzhan dag la ldang dam/ susur mchi'am// rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pas/ yab tsi/ 
201a8(1): phyi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha gzhan dag la ldang ba 'am/ bcur mchi pa 'am/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pas// yab ci rgya mtsho chen po mcho dang / rje'u dang / chu myig dang / mtsho
201a9(1): bran dang / lteng ka dang / khron pa la phyag 'tshal pa gsan tam/ gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pas// phu mo de dam yin no// bu mos smras pa/ yab se mi'i rgyal po ring ba ri nag po gzhan dag la bdud pa phyag
201a10(1): 'tshal ba gsan tam/ gzigs sas// rgyal pos smras pas ka/ bu mos smras pa/ yab ci nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma'i tshogs pa srin bu mye khyer gyi 'od 'dod pa gsan tam/ gzigs sa pa/ rgyal por sprus pa
201a11(1): bu mo de ni ma yin no// bu mos smras pa// yab ci dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge sngal ldang ba 'am/ bzur mame ba gsan tam// gzigs sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// thu zos smra phrag se
201b1(1): de bzhin du su zhig bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags la// dman pa la mos pa'i nyan thos wa ltar bur gyur pa byams pa chen
201b2(1): bo dang / snying rje chen po dang bral ba dag la dga' zhing ldang ba 'am/ mnur mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am// bkur sti pA gyid// yab chos kyi rgyal po chen po su zhig chos kyi 'khor lo bla na myed pa bskord tam/ skor bar bgyid pa ni/ 
201b3(1): nyan thos dman pazhand pa zhum pa// nyi rtse ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la dga' bas phyag 'tshal pa 'am// ldang ba 'am/ 'dud pa bgyid/ yab lha'i bdag po lha'i dbang po su zhig so/ rnam par dag pa'i lha'i bdag po don cu
201b4(1): gnyer ba na/ dge ba chung ba'i lha'i bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/ phyag 'tshal 'am/ ldang pa 'am/ sucur mchi par bgyid/ yab myi ched kyi bdag po tshangs pa lta bu su zhig 'jig rtend na tshangs pa'i snga gang bla na myed
201b5(1): ba don tu gnyer ba na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i tshangs pa lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'am/ ldang ba 'am/ sucung mchi ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal ba 'am gyid/ yab su zhig ye shes rgya mtsho dpag tu myed pa myi mnyam pa
201b6(1): dang mnyam pa'i chas rtogs pa chol can/ ma lang gi rkyeg rjes kyi mun bu'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa 'as de ldang ba 'ang/ bzung mchi ma/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/ yang
201b7(1): su zhig ri rab lta bu'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par tha dad pa dang ldan pa 'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku dond tu gnyer ba na/ yungs 'bru lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind kyi stobs dang ldan pa'i nyan thob dang
201b8(1): lag lnga pa 'am/ yung mami pa 'am/ phyag 'tshal pa 'am/ 'dud pa 'am/ 'dod pa bskyed par bgyid/ yab su zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi cha ba nyid// shes rab dang / bsod nams dang / 
201b9(1): shes dpe/ yon tan nyi ma dang / zla ba'i sdang ba dpag tu myed pa lta bu thos nas srin bu kye khyed kyi 'od wA bu rang gi rgyud la snang ba gnas pa/ gzhan gi sgra'i rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dag gis rnam par 'grol ba la 'dod pa
201b10(1): bskyed par babyed// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang / nyan thos rnams la phyag kyi 'tshal na/ bzhugs bzhin du lta lde spo/ de ri'i slad du zhe na/ su zhig zla ba dang / nyi ma
201b11(1): dkyi gyur te// brid ba kyi byed bya 'amab yedas byed/ yab gang nyan thog la sten pan can thos kyi dang gnas par 'gyur ro// yang dag par rtog pa pa'i sangs rgyas dang sten na/ thangs pa babyed pa
202a1(1): rin po che'i sems bskyed pa dang gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po chen po sa skyes dgras bum mya ngan myed kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar khyod nyan thos 'di dag mthong bzhin du myi ldang
202a2(1): zhing / bcung kyi 'gro la phyag kyi bgyid zhing bsnyen bkur myi byed de/ 'di dag bstand dang / bsod snyobs la das+yad byi 'dren pa ni// bu zo khyod lhag pa'i nga rgyal can zhig go// do skad ces sprus pa dang / bu mo bye dan byed kyi 'byid
202a3(1): pas rang gyi pha rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces spras so// yab bdag ni lhag pa'i brgyal can ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na// yab khyod grong khyer gyi dbul po rnams la myi bzhengs sucud myi bcud/ stan myi 'dings pa las na
202a4(1): khyod nyid lhag pa'ang rgyab can lags pa snyam bgyid do// rgyal pos spras pa/ bu mo de dag ni nga dang mtshungs pa ma yin no// bu mos smras pa// yab de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dang po sems bskyed pa ni nyan thos dang rang
202a5(1): sangs rgyas thams cad dang mtshungs pa ma lags so// rgyal pos spras pa// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ba rgyal dang dregs pa spangs te sems can thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar myi byed dam/ 
202a6(1): bu mos sprul pa/ yang byang chub sems dpa' ni kho na su 'dzin pa dang / za ba dang / khro ba dang // gnod sems dang // nyes pa spangs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyin par bgyi ba'i slad du sems can
202a7(1): hU~M thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo// yab nyan thos chen po 'di dag sa mkha nad tu 'dzind pa dang / za ba dang / khro ba dang / gnod sems dang nyes pa bsol yar bgyid pa yang ma mchis/ spang bar bgyi ba dang / dge ba 'phem
202a8(1): pasas kyi pa 'as chos te/ yas nyan pas ma da/ yangs rgyam 'bus kyis nyan kyis kyis chum la rnyed pa dang / ting nge 'an ji snyed pa dang / shes rab byed pam rlom brgyad sulanas kyang / yang de
202a9(1): dag la ni tshul khrims kyang g.yas mchis// ting nge 'dzin kyang galas mchis/ shes rab kyang galas mchis/ rnam par 'grol ba yang galas mchis/ rnam par 'grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang ga las mchis// 
202a10(1): yab 'di lta ste dper na bum pa chab kyis bltam pa'i nang du char ba pa na de chab kyi thigs pa gcig kyang myi lend la dang gnas par yang myi 'gyur ro// yab de bzhin du thos rnams la gal te sangs rgyas 'bum kyi ma chos bshad
202b1(1): chu gas kyang de dag yang 'dzin par bya 'gyuras/ chug khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par 'grol dang / rnam par 'grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang de dag la gnas par myi 'gyur zhing / rnam par 'jar
202b2(1): par yang skye 'gyur ro// yab 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni mu krung thams cad dang / char gyi rgyun thams cad 'dzind cing gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad bya zhen/ rgya mtsho chen po mi chad la mchim pa'i srad du lo// yab bya
202b3(1): chub sems dpas sems dpa' chen po rgya mtsho chen po lta bu de dag kyang de bzhin te/ chos bsta nang pa'i rgyu thams cad yang dag par 'dzind cing chos bstand pa thams cad de la yang dag gnas so// de ri'i slad du zhen
202b4(1): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi sno nin phyi ma nyam pa mnyam pa'i slad du'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ma skyes dgra'i bu mor gyur pa ni/ bye ngan byed byin
202b5(1): yon tan gzi brjid brgyan// nyan thos lnga brgya dag ni lpags gyur kyang // de la phyag bya'i phying ni de ma langs// ma skyes dgra'is de la spras pa'i// bu mo don 'di pal nyand par gyis// khyod kyis nyan rdzos
202b6(1): brgya 'thod bzhin du// phyag bya'i phyir na ci phyir ldang gyi byed/ bu mo myed na byed kyis byin pa nar/ nyan thol 'di dag bdag gis mtho dpan/ ci'i phyir phyag 'jal bsam pa phyi skyes pa/  bdag sa
202b7(1): mchis yab cig tshig ni gsan par gsol// dper na myi zhig rgya mtshor mchis nas kyang / rin cen 'byung khung nas ni mching du blangs// de bzhin bdag ni nyan thos thams cad kyang
202b8(1): ye shes dbyings nas nyan thos blangs snyam bgyid// dper na rgyal po nor gyi dbang phyug po// sa bdag 'khor los bsgyud pa mnyes bgyis nas// kar sha pa ni gcig cam gsol na ni// de'i sa rgyal
202b9(1): po bzhen pa don sa mchis// gang gis kha mos spu pa mnyes bgyis nas/ bye ba phrag stong gsol ba bgyis nan// del ni dbul mang no dang ldan par bgyid// debani rgyal za legs par pasgo
202b10(1): lags / kas sha pa ni spong ba'i myi de bzhin du// gang gis sangs rgyas yon tan mthas yas rnams// zos nas theg pa dman la 'dod pa skyed pa// rkyen thos kun la bdag ni de bsnyas bgyid// non
203a1(1): bsgrub bgyid myini ji lta ba// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de 'dra ste// rgyal ba chos kyis rgyal po mnyes bgyis shing // byang chub reg nas sems can 'dul bar bgyid// dper na nad pa nang
203a2(1): rgyas gzir rnams sman pa'i la// grol bgyid de bzhin gzhan gyi sgra phyir 'brang ba'i// nyan thos nyon mongs rnams kyis gzingad pa thams cad kyang // byang chub sems dpa' smand pa lta bus grol bar bgyid/ 
203a3(1): semam pa dbang po grol 'gyid spanang ba btang na sa ni// mos kyar sems can las su zhig 'dud bgyid// de bzhi rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ldan par gnyer ba ni// mo brgyang nga can mam yin bya zhig 'dud par 'gyid
203a4(1): ji ga na pa thotha par gyur pa thams cad la// smand pa dag gis gsos par nus par byi byung ba// de bzhin nyan thos thams cad mom par byar dud// sangs rgyas smadad pa dag gis gsol bar gyi phyi na/ 
203a5(1): 'di na sman pa gang zhig bdag gis bdag nyid la// gso bar sems kyi sems can gzhan la ma lags te// de 'dri'i bdag nyid/ khengs par bgyid pa'i nga rgyal gyi// sman pa de dag ni 'dod pa'i
203a6(1): sems myi bskyed// sman pa'i gang zhig snying rje bskyed nas bdag nyid ji lta bar// de bzhin pha rol rnams kyang nad las grol bgyid pa/ de ni mchod par 'os shing bsngags par bgyid pa dang // 
203a7(1): 'jig rten kun gyis gdung par bgyid pa'i gnas kyang lags// gang zhig ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur de nas// bdag nyid grol par bgyid kyi sems can gzhan ma lags// de ni smand pa bdag nyid grol
203a8(1): par bgyid pa ltar// mkhas pa dag gis mchod par bgyid pa'i gnas ma lags// gang zhig ye shes rig pa gtso pa rtogs 'gyu dad nas// sems can grangs myed pa sdug bsngal dag las grol par bgyid// de dag byang
203a9(1): chub mchog la 'dun pa skyed pa ste// de ni 'jig rten kun gyi bsngags par bgyi ba lags// me dan da'i shing sdong mdzes pa ma lags la// de dag rnams kyi grib ma yang yangs pa ma lags te// me ra na da'i shing
203a10(1): 'janyarna ma ma thams cad kyis// rnam par 'grol ba'i grib sa nye bar bsten pa lags// can dan mchog gi sdong chen dag ni ma pa'is// gdungs pa'i skye bo dga' phyis nyes par bstend pa lags// de bzhin
203b1(1): bdag ni byang chub sebs dpa' rnabs la yang // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag kyi don bgyid lags// pa yang myig rjes chun yangs ma lags// cha bas gdungs pa zhi bar gyi dgyid la// gang ga'i klung ni sel
203b2(1): can bye ba ltog// tshim par bgyis nas rgya mtsho chen por mchi// ba lang rtsig rjes chu 'dra'i nyan thos kun// sems can kun gyi cha bzhi myi bgyid// gang ga klung 'dra byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sems
203b3(1): can mtha' yas chos kyi satshim par bgyid// ji ltar rin ched char ni 'bab pa na// dbul po dag ni 'gron du len par bgyid// gang zhig nor mang de dag blangs nas ni// sems can dbul po nor dang ldan par bgyid
203b4(1): de ltar sangs rgyas rin chen chos char 'beb// nyan thos rnams ni dam chos rin chen las// chung du 'dzin te byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sems can don slad d+ha mang du le nad par bgyid// je ltar sems
203b5(1): can dag ni ri rab kyi// drung du mchis na gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur dari bo gzhan la sems can rnams mchis na// gser gyi kha dog can du yod myi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ri rab bzhin/ 
203b6(1): nab krol mdog tu kha dog gcig tu 'gyur// nyan thos rnams kyis ye shes 'dod byi bgyid// yab cig de ltar thA phran rtse mo'o// zil pa'i thigs pas lo thog rgyal bye bgyid
203b7(1): rab tu khengs pa'i srin gyis sa ste 'di// cim par ba nyid cing lo tog 'phel bar bgyid// nyan thos thams cad zild pa'i thigs pa bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rab khengs srin dang 'dra// snying rje mngon/ 
203b8(1): bya ba gang dag rted na ni// stong gsum dab chos chu'i sa chig par bgyid// ka ra bi ya kye tog dri mchog sbyin// de sa ni skyes bu bud byed dga' byi bgyid// tsas ka'i bye tog dril dga'// mud pal bar shi ka yang na/ 
203b9(1): bzhin no// gnyan thos kar ba da'i dri bzhin te// de dag shes pas skye dgu dga' skye 'gyur// kun mkhyend dri can byang chub sems dpa' la// lha dang myi rnam pa rab su dga' bar 'gyur// gcig pu mchi ba de lam
203b10(1): ci mchis// gang zhig sems can mtha' yas khrid pa zad// nyan thos skye ring gcig pu mchi' ba bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' dag ni ded dpon 'dra// 'gron zhig gzhan zhig gzhan gis dru 'ad pa rnal pa dang // bye bo/ 
204a1(1): kun ma mo yad bgyid kun 'gran bzhin// sgra 'brang nyan thos kun ni 'gron dang 'dra// byang chub sems dpa' kun la 'gron bzhin bgyid// gzings la brtend pas chu bo chen po las// gzhan dag
204a2(1): bsgral bar dus par byi 'gyur gyi// brtan pagyid gu'i nang du zhugs na ni// sems cad bye ba mang po 'gros par bgyid// nyan thos gzings la rtend pa lta bu ste// sems can gzhan dag sgrol par ji ltar nus// rdzogs pa'i/ 
204a3(1): byang chub zung zhugs byang chub sems// sdug bsngal mcho ba las sems can bsgrol bar bgyid// ji ltar g.yul ngong bong bu gzhon na ni// sgral las rgyal bar nus par mye 'gyur gyi// glang chen rta dang shing rta zhon na ni// g.yul tu lhags
204a4(1): pa'i dgra rnams choms par 'gyur// nyan thos rnams ni bong bu gzhon pa bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' glang chen gzhan 'dra ste// sems can kun la phan pa dang bde slad du// de dag shing dbang drung du bdud kyang 'joms// ji ltar bar
204a5(1): snang skar mas rgyas gyur da kyang // de dag gis ni mtshan mo mdzes myi 'gyur// zla ba rab tu rgyas par shand pas ni// mtshan mo mkha' la thig ge bzhin tu medzes// yab gcig nyan thos 'di dag skar ma 'dra// rgyal po byang chub
204a6(1): sems dpa' zla ba bzhin// gang dag sems can kun la sman spa ha hu/ ye shes sha dad par skye bo snang bar bgyid// yab cig srin bu mye khye tshogs 'od kyis// las rnams la ni 'jug par myi nus kyi// 'jas gri ba'idi/ 
204a7(1): na nyi ma'i 'od rnams kyis// bya ba sna tshogs brgya dag bgyid par 'gyid par 'gyur// nyan thos 'di dag srin bu mye khyer 'dra// de dag shes 'od yang dag mthong myi 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnab grol nyi ma lta bu'i// shes rab ye shes kyis
204a8(1): ni sems can 'grel// yab cig wa brgya dag gis skad phyung yang // ri dgas tshogs rnams 'drog par myi 'gyur gyi// gseng gi skad kyis glang chen ri dgas dang // byar bcas rnams kyang phyogs su 'byed par 'gyur// yang
204a9(1): cig de ltar nyan thos pa 'das gzigs// de dag skad kyis bdud rnapas skrag kyi 'gyur// rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i yod pa 'byed pas// bdud dang de bzhin bdud ris skrag par 'gyur// yab cig rgyu 'di dag gis mgron
204a10(1): pos na// theg pa dman pa dag la 'dod kyi bskyed// su zhig bla myed byang chub spangs nas ni// theg dman la 'dod pa bskyed par bgyid// gang dag byang chub dam pa yongs su spangs nas// theg pa dman la 'dod pa bskye
204b1(1): na bar bgyid// de dag tshong ngan rnyed par thob ma gyur // de dag myed skyes pa ni des par mchis// gang dag ljon pa nas 'jig rten sman slad du// byang chub mchog la 'dun pa bskyed par bgyid// de dag legs 'tsho rnyed pa legs pa
204b2(1): rnyed// de dag myi lus thob stegs par mchis// gang dag lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // 'jig rten slad du las bgyid yid kyang rtond// yang dag rtag tu sems can sman slad brtson// de dag sru dum pa ra'i mye tog bzhin
204b3(1): de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bu mo mya ngan byed kyis byin pas tshigs su bcad pa bstand pa 'di dag thos nas cad kyi spa bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di snyam sems te/ kye ma bu mo 'di spobs pa thogs
204b4(1): myed pa zhig na/ ci bzod pa thob pam ma thob pa bdag gis 'di ltar brtag par byar des so snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// ji bu mo khyod nyan thos kyi theg
204b5(1): smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu// gal te bdag chos dga' zhig/ don tu gnyer na ni// bdag seng ge'i sgra ci yang myi sgrogs pa zhig na btsun pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar bdag ni chos gang yang don tu myi gnyer te
204b6(1): de'i phyir bdag na seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so// btsun pa sha ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du/ ji bu mo khyod theg pa la yang dag par zhugs mam zhes zer pa ni btsun pa sha ri'i bus chos gang mongon tu byas pa'i chos de la// ci nyan thos shes bya/ 
204b7(1): pa 'am kyi rang sangs rgyas shes bya ba las/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i theg pa rnam par gzhag pa yod dam// gnas rtan sha ri'i bus smras pa/ bu mo chos de la ni theg pa rnam par bzhag pa skyed de// chos den
204b8(1): 'di ltar mtshan ma nyid byed par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu mtshan nyid byed pa'i chos la dod tu gnyer ba ci zhig yod/ sha ri'i bus smras pa bu mo chos de la ni don tu gnyer gci yang byed do// 
204b9(1): gnas brtan sha ri'i bus bu mo myedang byed kyis byin pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams dang / mo pa'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang bye brag ni ci yod/ tha dad tu dbyer ba ni sa yod khru sa/ 
205a1(1): smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid la bye brag ni ci yod/ tha dad du dbye ba ni ci yod// sha ri'i bus smras pa bye brag byed cing wa dang du dbye ba ci yang myed do// bu mos smras pa
205a2(1): btsun pa sha ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang dben pa nyid pa kyi ga bye brag byed cing / tha dang tu dbye ba ci yang byed pa/ de bzhin tu/ btsun pa sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas bya chos rnams dang / ma tha'i skye ba'i chos rnams sa
205a3(1): bye brag byed cing tha dad tu dbye ba myed do// btsun pa ga ro'i bu 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' dang blag pa byed pa la yang bye brag byed cing tha dad mu dbye ba ci yang myed do// btsud pa sha ri'i bu de bzhin sa
205a4(1): sangs rgyas kyi sa rnams dang / ma tho'i rgyu ba'i chos rnam pa la yang bye thes skyed cing tha dad tu dbye ba kyi yang byed do// gnas brtan sha ri la bu tsa d+hi smra bar gyur to// de nas me dang ldan 'a phyel 'gal gi bu chen bam
205a5(1): bu mo lce ngan byed kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyon de skad ces zer pa las na// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shi nad tu cha da pas lhag pa zhig mthong la// nyan thos kyi chos rnam sa ni shinang
205a6(1): tu man par mthong ngam can/ khyod can thos chen po nams mthong na ldang ba yang kyi byed/ phyag kyang kyi 'cham srur par bya'o/ katakyi byed/ bstan dag cad rmomasas rang rgyan 'dred pa
205a7(1): de skad ces smras pa dang / bu mo mya ngan byed kyis byin pas gnas brtan mye'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mye'u 'gal gyi bu chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na skar ma'i
205a8(1): gzugs su gtogs pas / ji snyed gcig yod shes sam/ bye'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ bu mo snyoms par zhugs na ni kho bos grangs shes kyis// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mye'u 'gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin
205a9(1): gshegs pas ni lan cig mnyam par gzhag pa nyid kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes
205a10(1): cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa yang rab tu mkhyen na// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi lha ji smos te/ btsun pa mye'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni de bzhin
205b1(1): gshegs pa dang / nyan thos rnams kyi khyad par yin te/ 'di ni tha dad du dbye ba yin no// btsun pa mye'u 'gal gyi bu chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig pa ni ji snyed cig yod/ chags pa rje
205b2(1): snyed cig yod/ shes sam// mye'u 'gal gyi bus spras pa/ bu mo de ni myi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa myel 'gal gi chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa ni ji snyed yod/ ma byon pa ni ji snyed
205b3(1): cig yod/ da ltar bzhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam// mye'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa// bu mo de ni myi shes so// mu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mye'u 'gal gyi bu chen po sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig
205b4(1): yod/ zhe sdang la 'apyod pa ji snyed cig yod/ gti mug la 'gyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod// ma mnyam pa la 'askyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mye'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni myi shes so// bu mos spras
205b5(1): bar btsun pa mye'u dgal gyi bu chen po nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can ni ji snyed yod/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni ji snyed cig yod// theg pa chen po la yang dag bzhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes
205b6(1): bab/ me 'u 'das kyi bus bsdus pas/ bu ma non gyi shes so// bu mos smras pas/ btsun pa skye'u dgas kyi bu chen po nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/ rab tu
205b7(1): sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ji snyed cig yod/ sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems cani ji snyed cig yod shes sam/ mye'u dgas gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni myi shes so// bu mos
205b8(1): smras pa// btsun pa rtse'u 'gal gyi bu chen po yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can ji snyed cig yod// sog pa rnas pa'i sems can ni ci snyen cag yod/ ma nges pa'i sems cadan ni ji snyed cig yod shes sapa
205b9(1): bu me de ni byi shes so// bu mos smras pa// btsun pa bye'u dgal gyi bu tshed po de bzhin gshegs pas ni// de dag dang gzhan yang de'i gong cu gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin pa dag kyang rab tu 'byed da/ 
205b10(1): na ses can gzhad da ga ga khro nye/ bdun pa bye sa kyai bu chen ma mad sa bzhin gshegs pa'i tha la mi byed par yin no// ban pa rkye'u 'das gyi chen po gzhan yang / de bzhin gshegs pas khyod chu 'acu
206a1(1): kachen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan da kyis/ btsun pa bye'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rtend kyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba gang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos dag
206a2(1): tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyang btond pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ shing ljond pa thams cad las can dan spu gyi snying po'i spos gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
206a3(1): ni khyab par 'gyur ba'i spos kyi ngad ldang ba yod pa der song shig/ gnas brtan mye'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ bu mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i mying yang kho bos da gdod thos na/ sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir/ 
206a4(1): ji ltar 'gro bar bya// de nas bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pas khri de las spangs/ bzhin tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems
206a5(1): bskyed pa zag rkyen pas dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dkyis nan bstan/ 'don pa dang bde pa'i tshig de// de bzhi gshegs pa cwa rab tu byed pa'i 'od bye des bdag nyid dang / rang gi 'a sa
206a6(1): rgyas kyis zhing nyan thos chen po 'di dag la stond par gyur cig/ tsan dan gyi dri de dag kyang nyan thos chen po 'di dag gis tshor bar gyur da cig ces byas so// de nas bu mo mya ngan myed kyis byin pas tshig de skad ces smras
206a7(1): ma thag tu bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer gyis de nyid kyi tshe 'od gang gis nyan thos chen po de dag gis 'jig rten dgye khams spos kyi 'od de dang
206a8(1): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer de chos pastond cing bzhugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od sku las bkye'o// chos bstand pa de yang sangs rgya
206a9(1): kyis bcus 'jig rten kyi khams 'di thos so// can dan sbrus gyi snying po'i dri dag 'jig rten gyi khams bye mad 'di khyab par gyud to// de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab su 'gyed pa'i 'od gzeng des kyang gsung gi yan lagatsug
206a10(1): bcud ldan pa'i tshig gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo skye ngan byed kyis byin pas de skad smrab pa bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sebs bskyed pa thags/ nyan thob dang / rangs
206b1(1): ma can rje kyang gnan // na byung chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po byams pa bya nan kyi phung po la gnas pas can dan sprul gi snying po dri sor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'du na cem gas pa tu/ 
206b2(1): ma ldan 'das can dang kyi smras kyi snying po'i drag las byung lags// de nad ces gomasad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di zhed ces bka' la yan to// byangs pa bus
206b3(1): garjod kyis byed pas 'dis nyid ma pangon po dpas kyi bad du seng ge'i bla thAg 'i// nas nyan thamachen pa de dag sa bden pa'i byon kyi sa drums kyis 'dzin rten gyi khasas grub bya 'od sa bya ban de bzhin gshegs pa smos rab
206b4(1): rtsa 'byed pa'i 'od gzed de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chos stond cing bzhugs par yang bstand// 'jig rtend gyi khams spos kyi 'od de'i tsan dan sprub gyi snying po'i dri des kyang 'jig rten gyi
206b5(1): khabs 'ang khyab par byas so// de nas bu po bye ngan byed kyis byin pas da tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen zol 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa me'u 'gos kyi bu chen po mkhas pa su zhig byung chu batha
206b6(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi cho 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrus pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa rmad du 'byung ba 'di lta bu dag mthong ngam thos na// nyan thos dman pa zhand pa// zhum pa/ nyi ceg
206b7(1): zhi shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la ldang ba 'am/ sur 'gro ba 'am/ phyag 'tshal bar byed pa/ btsun pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de ji tsam du thag ring de shes sam// rtse'u 'gas kyi bus
206b8(1): smrab pas/ bu mo de ni byi shes so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa mye'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gal te khyod 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul can sha stag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dper na bu ras shing gi chas
206b9(1): lam// 'od ma'i tshal lcal/ 'das bu'i tshal 'am// 'bras sa lu'i zhing bzhin du mtshams myed par gang bar gyur nas de dag thams cad kyis bskal par bachis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba de/ 
206b10(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig 'das pa'i pha rol na/ 'dug pa bgrang ba'i thabs kyis rtogs par myi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od gzer gyis 'od de dag kyi snang bar
207a1(1): bang / sangs rgyas kyi ning de yang kyi snang bar mdad do// denas me dang lda spyod 'thung chen mos/ bum mya na byed kyis byin pa cas 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyed kyis bco ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
207a2(1): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyab shag kyi thub pa de sngon mthong ngab// bu mos smras pa// btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar nus sam// de bzhin gshegs pas// gang dag dal
207a3(1): gzugs su mthong / gang dag la sgrar shes pa/ log par spong bar zhugs pa// skye bo de dgar myi mthong // sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid blta// 'drend pa rnams ni chos kyi sku// chos nyid shes par bya myin pa/ 
207a4(1): da ni rnam par shes myi nus// zhes ma gsungs sam// btsun pa 'od dru/ chen po gzhan yang // bu mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs dpa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag
207a5(1): thub pa sngon mthong ngab zhes de skad zer pa ni/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po bdage gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong mod kyi/ sha'i myig gis ma yin te/  gzugs su ma yin no// lha'i myig gis ma yin te// chod pan
207a6(1): ma yin no// shes rab kyi myig gi pha ma yin to// 'du shes su ma yin no// chos kyi myig gis ma yin te/ 'du byed du ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi myig gis ma yin te/ nam par shes pas ma yin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhan yang bad
207a7(1): gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste// dper na/ gnas brtan gyi ma rig pa dang / srid pa sred par mthong ba bzhin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhin yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ dper na gnas rten gyis rang
207a8(1): 'dzin pa dang / ra 'di 'dzin par mthong ba bzhin no// gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo 'di ltar ma rig dang srid pa la sred pa dang // rang 'dzidad pa dang / ba'i nga 'dzind pa'i chos 'di gnyis ni myed pa yin no// chos nyan
207a9(1): byed pa de ni bltar gyi nus so// bu mo mya ngan byed kyis byin pas smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de de bzhin no// chos thams cad myed pa yin te/ de dag ni blta bar myi nus so// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ci sang / 
207a10(1): rgyas kyi chos kyang byed dam/ bu mos sprus pas// gnas brtan sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang rung ste/ chos 'ga' zhig yongs su grub par 'dod dam/ 'od srung chen po sa spras pas// bu ru
207b1(1): zo za rnam sa'i chos rnams la yang yongs su grub par 'iphyi 'dod na// sangs rgyas kyi cho sa rnams la swA rdzi spros// bu mo smrab pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po chos gang dag yongs su grub pa myed pa'i chos de dag ci yod pa yin
207b2(1): na/ 'on te byed pa yin// 'od srung chen pos smras pa// bu mo myed pa de dag ni myed pa yin no// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bas na chos thams cad ni byed pa nyid do// byed pa gang yin pa de dag la ni lta ba rnams
207b3(1): par sbyangs par bya ba byed de// btsud pa 'od bsrung chen po rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi thu mo sangs rgyas la blta ba rnas par sbyangs par 'dod pas ni/ bdag la ny+tsa par rnam par spyad par bya'o// 'od zung chen pos sprul pa
207b4(1): bu mo bdag la lta ba che lter rnam par dag par 'gyur/ bu mos smras pas/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang gi mo bdag rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin myed pa nyid du bos na// de cas gyis na bdas
207b5(1): blta ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo bdag gi rang bzhin ci yin// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa/ 'od srung chen po bdag gi rang bzhin ni stong pa nyid do// 
207b6(1): bdag gi rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir bdag dben pa yang yin no// rang bzhin myed pa'i bdag dben no// rang bzhin myed pa des chos thams cad dben no// nga 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ 
207b7(1): bu mo khyod kyis su las chos thos nas/ 'di ltar khyod kyi yang dag pa'i lta ba skyes par gyur da// bu mo yang dag pa'i lta ba skyes pa la ni mu gnyis dang / rkyen gnyis yod de/ gzhan gyi sgra dang / bdag
207b8(1): nyid kyi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las byung ngo zhes de skad gsungs so// bu mos smras pa// btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang dag gzhan gyi dring 'jog pa'i shes rab can de dag ni/ gzhan gyi sgra dang chus
207b9(1): bzhin du me sor rtog pa las lha rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang dag gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa'i shes rab can dag ni gzhan gyi sgra myi 'chol// btsun pa 'od srung chen po ji ltan
207b10(1): na dge slong rdul bzhin du zhugs pa yin/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo gang gi tshe dge slong ji skad thos sgo rnams kyis dod la gnye bar rtog par byed pa de skar na/ dge slong rdul bzhin du bzhugs pa yin/ 
208a1(1): 'od srung chen pos smras pa// bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du bzhugs pa yin/ bu mos smras pa// btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can
208a2(1): thabs par gan cig gnas kyang sems can du 'du shes bskyed par gyi byed pa de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du bzhugs pa yin no// btsun pa 'od srung chen po zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ni sngon gyi mtha'i de
208a3(1): bzhin nyid dang ldan no// chos thams cad ni phyi ma'i mtha'i de bzhin dang ldan no// chos thams cad ni da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no zhes btsun pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de lta bus spyod par myi byed na/ de
208a4(1): cab kyis na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no// 'od srung chen pos spras paM// bu mo chos de dag la ji ltar spyad par bya/ dbu mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po ji ltar de bzhin nyid
208a5(1): la yang spyod pa yang myed/ myi spyor pa yang myed par mthong ba de bzhin du/ chos thams cad la sbyor par bya'o// 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar mthong na chos thams cad mthong ba// bu mos smras pa/

211b9(1): ces bya bar 'gyur// de de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa tshad myed pa dag byas nas// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bu de nyid du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhig gshegs
211b10(1): pa kun tu 'od gzer zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo zla ba can byis bdag nyid lung bstand pa thos nas// tshim zhing mgu ste yid rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba phul te/ 
212a1(1): tshangs par spyod par rgyal pos gnang nas// bslab pa'i gzhi dag bzung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mye ngan myed kyis byin pas lhas phul ba'i mye tog man dar bya dag gis// bcom ldan
212a2(1): 'das dang 'khor thams cad la gtodad to// de nas par snang las pabs te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshig 'di skad du bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub thob pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
212a3(1): thams cad rdzus te skye zhing chos gos chur smigs gyon la/ rin po che'i pad ma dag la daskyil mo krum bcas te skye bar 'gyur ba lta na bden pa dang // bden pa'i tshig des dper na dge slong bsnyen rdzogs byas nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam

216a4(1): dang / da mas sa pa pa pa na padasas pa ga pan / na na pa ma ra ga dag/  dag
216a5(1): sa dga' ba 'am/ sun ma dga' ba 'am nye dus dga' ba'am/ noms dga' ba 'am/ rgyan la dga' ba 'gro/ gos la dga' ba 'am/ lus la dga' ba 'am/ stog la dka' ba 'am/ kron
