216a6(1): khyer la dka' ba 'am/ skye mched la dga' ba ma skyed kyi/ bram ze gzhan du na sangs rgyas nyid rnam pas rjes su dran no// bram ze kho mos ni gsum sems la yid la bya ba yid la byas te// de bzhin gshegs pa phyo/ 
216a7(1): gang na bzhugs pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang bshad pa de dag thams cad kho mos legs par yongs su bzung zhing / kho mos don dam tshig 'bru las yi ge dang tshig gcig kyang chud zos par byas so// de bzhin
216a8(1): gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor pa kho mos nam yang yid la ma byas par ma gyurd to// kho mos nyin mtshan kang tu yang sangs rgyas ma mthong ba dang / chos thos pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen
216a9(1): bkur ma byas pa rmed to// bram ze kho mos ni sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / chos nyand pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen da bkur bya bas chog pa myed do// de nas bram ze'i khye'u zhig la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod can
216a10(1): lalo rgyus 'di rgyal po dang btsun mo la gsol cig/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rings pa'i tshul du song ste/ ji ltar mthong ba'i lo rgyus thams cad rgyam ze dang bcud mo la gsold to// bu mo dri ma byed kyi
216b1(1): byin kyis kyang ji ltar bram ze tshangs pa'i lhalas bathogs pa bram ze lnga brgya po de dag gis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod/ chos dang dge
216b2(1): 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do// de bas bu mo dris myed kyis byin pa shing rtams babs nas bram ze dag dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag ka la ba der song ste phyind nas/ de dag
216b3(1): nang pa la man zos phyag 'chal te/ gus pa dang bcas/ zhes dang bcas par/ tshe dang ldan pasha ra'i bu'i mdun tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha re'i bu ga la ba de logs su thal mo spyad dpa btud de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha rin
216b4(1): bu la 'di skad ces smras so// sha ri'i bu bud myed ni shes rab sor gnyis pa nyon mongs pa drag pa/ bag myed pa mang ba/ dman pa la mos pa/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i dbang du mchi ba lags na/ 
216b5(1): bdag la thugs che ba nye bar bzung ste/ ci nas kyang bdag gi yun ring po'i don dang / smand pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ btsun pas de/ de ltar bdag la chos legs par bas nang tu gsol dang
216b6(1): dang ni bu ma la 'di skad ces snyam mo// bram chung na me ma ma nas yang chugs pa dang ga tad kyim nad par ma gyur to// nas yang dka' ba dang / me ba dang ldan pa'i sems sa bskyed do// des zer ba de lta khyod bden pa nga
216b7(1): pa bad pas brtson nas/ 'ad nyi de skang med byung ba'i tshul kyis swA/ de nas rgyab po gas sa rgyas kyis dang ga du na la rtsegs su lu de sprus pa/ khyod kyis gzugs byad zhwa'i bu mo batshungs zhing 'dra// brgyan ma / 
216b8(1): kyis ni chas pa'i mabyad 'dzin// ji ltar khyod ni rnam yang gnyid kyis mnonod pa/ ci'i byed bu ma thud ni 'di 'dra'i mid byung byud// khyod kyi rgyas srid rgyam shing ginang du legs par 'byor // man rtag tu myong byed par
216b9(1): byen pa med// bu mo dga' ba dems ci 'du gzhan yod na// de yim khyod kyi sus na dga' ba rnyed ma srung // drugacong pangs la yid du 'a ba ste/ skye'i kun pa dga' babyed med na/ yon tan bcun gsu rje
217a1(1): brgyad pa khyod// ci 'byir na khyim deng dga' bar gyud/ bum khyed kyis ci zhig thos gyur cing / ci zhig mthong na 'di ltar yid myi bde/ yongs su nyams zhing yid byung sems su gyur // khyod kyi 'dod pa
217a2(1): ce 'dra ngal spros// de nas bu mo drim byed kyis byin pas rang gi pha rgyal po sa gsal rgyal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// yab cig phung po nyes dmyigs snod rnams dang // khyim gyi skyon rnams thugs su ma chung ram
217a3(1): 'khor ba'o gnas ni gang la blta dang mtshungs// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten myi gnas 'jigs pa can// sbrul gdug nang na gnas pa'i khyim 'di la// gnyid 'dod pa'i 'dun pa ga ya mchis// khams 'di dag ni
217a4(1): gdug pa'i sbrul bzhi ste// srid pa sems pa bde ba gas mchis// myi mdza tshogs kyis rab tu gtses gyur cing // mgon bur phyin la dga' ba ga la mchis// kun nas nyon mongs dgra
217a5(1): ma yongs brjod pa// ji ltar bde thon rtul tho bka' sacol da cig/ dugazungs pa la bde ba gas mchisad// gsad par sgril dga' ba ga la mchis// g.yang mche 'dir
217a6(1): su zhig yid rton bgyid// rgyal po 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten de dang mtshungs// blo ngan dag gis lus rnams bor ba ni// ri rab tu ma gyi phung por gyurd to zhes// de bzhin gshegs pas dpe' ni/ 
217a7(1): bka' saHla dam// 'dus kyi byas slu ba'i chos la su yid rton da/ pha dang ma dang sdug dang mying po dang / bu dang pa lag gnyen tshogs 'gro ba kun// 'dus byas thas cad me long gzugs brnyan 'dra// 
217a8(1): 'di 'dra'i myi sdug gangs su yid rtond// gang tshe bdag gis rang byung rgyal ba mthong // de tshe sangs rgyas 'gyur snyam sems kyang skye/ byang chub sems dpa' bag myed 'gyur ba ni/ yab cig pa dag gis ma mthong
217a9(1): ma thos so// bdag ni mtshan rdzogs rgyal ba lnga batshal gyur da/ bde bar gshegs pa'i gsungs pa'i chos kyang thos// rgyal ba rgyal po'i sras po 'di dag mthong // yab cig ji ltar 'dod bstand par bgyid
217a10(1): de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal bu mo'i tshig thos nas/ cang myi smra bar gyur da to// de nas bu mo dri ma myed kyis byin pas/ rang gi pha cang myi smra bar gyur da par rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa
217b1(1): sha ra'i bu khyod la zhu ba zhus thugs rtse bar dgongs te lan btab tu gsol da/ 'di ltar btsun pa sha ri'i bu ni bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bgand pa lags na/ ci shes rab de
217b2(1): 'dus byam lags sam/ 'or te 'dus ma byas lags pa / de gal te 'dus byas rgya lags na/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'dus byas thams cad ni brdzun pa slu ba'i chos cad no zhes bka' mam yad to/ ci ste 'dus ma byas
217b3(1): ma lags na/ 'dus pa byas la ni skye ba ma mchis so// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la ni 'phrad pa ma mchis na/ 'phrad pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyis ji ltar btsun pa sha ri'i bu shes rab chen po zhes bkye// de
217b4(1): nanas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu cang myi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mye'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// sha ri'i bu bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ sha ri'i bus
217b5(1): smras pa/ bu mo ni 'dus byas myi 'dri'i/ bu mos ni skye ba skyed pa dris te/ de la ni lan btab par myi nus so// de nas bu mo dri ma myed kyis byin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smra so/ 
217b6(1): 'di ltar btsun pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyod ni/ bcode ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu brtand pa la gus na/ ci tshe dang ldan btsun du 'du shes pa la gnas te rdzu 'phrul stond
217b7(1): tam/ 'and te chos su 'du shes pa la gnas te rdzu 'phrul dand/ gal te sems can du 'du shes pa la gnas te rdzu 'phrul/ hond na/ sems can ni ma mchis pa se/ de lta bas na rdzu 'phrul de
217b8(1): sangs mchis par 'gyur ro// ci kyi chom su 'du shes pa la gnas te ston dan/ chom nyid ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'o// 'gyur ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de la ni/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis na/ rnam par
217b9(1): rtog pas ji ltar tshe dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'byor par gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu che po yang cang myi smra bar gyur to// de nas byams ma'i bu gang po mtshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// 
217b10(1): pamyi'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bu mos dris pa'i yan thob shig/ mye'u 'gal gyi bus smras pa/ bu mo ni 'gyur ba myi 'di'i/ bu mos ni 'gyur ba myed pa dris te/ 'gyur ba myed pa dang / rnam par myi rtog pa ni de bzhin gshegs
218a1(1): pa rnams kyi byang chub yin pas de ni yan gtab par gyi nus so// de nas bu mo drim phyed kyis byin pas/ byams pa'i bu mo gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltang tshe dang ldan pa ka
218a2(1): boni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu bahand pa lags na/ ci tshe dang ldan pa dmyigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos pa ha nad tas/ 'o nad te dmyigs pa ma mchis pa'i chos btond
218a3(1): gal te dmyigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos bahand na ni/ khyod byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni dmyigs pa dang bcas pa'i slang dus
218a4(1): de lta bas na btsun pa yang byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi chos rnams dang ma bral ba lags so// ci ste dmyigs pa ma mchis pa'i chos nyon da na ni/ chos smra ba nyid dngos po ma mchis par 'gyur te/ 
218a5(1): rmyi 'thad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa glang po yang cang myi smra bar grung da to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos gang po la/ 'di skad ces smras so// gang po bu mos dris pa'i
218a6(1): lan thob shig/ tshe dang ldan pa gang pos smras pa/ bu mo ni kun rdzob myi 'di'i/ bu mos ni don dam pa dris te/ de ni lan gtab par myi nus / de nas bu mo dri ma myed kyis byin pas/ @
218a7(1): tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smos so// 'di ltar 'od srungs chen po ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la snyoms par zhugs nas/ langs te gzhan dag la chos stonod cing gang dag las tha na gzang
218a8(1): bu gang tsam gyi bsod snyoms yongs su blangs pa de dag thams cad mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhe na/ de ci btsun pas lus kyis sbyin pa spyod ngam/ 'ond te/ sems kyis sbyin pa spyod/ gal te lus
218a9(1): kyis spyod na/ lus ni bems po ga/ yol pa ma mchis pa/ byed pa ma mchis pa ste/  dang shing dang sdig pa khe chos lta bu myig yor dang mtshungs pas des kyang sbyor bar myi nus so// jis
218a10(1): sems kyis spyodang/ sems ni sgyum lta bu gnas ma mchis pa ste/ des kyang spyod par myi nus ma/ ji ste lus dang sems kyi phyi ro la dkyis spyod na/ de ni ma mchis pa ho/ ma mtshos pas ji ltar spyod par
218b1(1): bgyid denas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po yang myi smra bar gyur da/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ med nga ldan pa 'od srungs chen po bu mo sa dris pa'i lan thob shig/ rjo
218b2(1): blangs chen thos smram pa/ bu mo ni medad pa myi 'di'i/ bu mos ni yind pa skyed pa rjes shing yang dag pa'i mthal 'debs/ de ni ldan gdab par myi nus so// de nas bu mo
218b3(1): sbyin kyis byin chen gnas pan rab 'byu po 'di na ces smram po 'di sa btsun pa rab 'byor de na bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mangs pa skyed par gnas pa rnams kyis mchog tu bsanan/ 
218b4(1): ba lags na/  nyon mongs pa myed pa de dngos po sa rab tu phyo ba sags sam/ 'on te chos nyid kyis rab tu phye ba lags/ gal te dngos pos rab tu phye ba lags na ni/ 'dus
218b5(1): byas su 'gyur ro/ kyi sen pa nyid kyis rab tu bya ba lags na/ chos khrid ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'gagro pa ma mchis pan dam tshan nyid de skye bam mtshos pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'gag pa
218b6(1): ma mchos pa'i mtshan nyid gang lags pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do// mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa doni de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid gangs gas pa de ni 'gyung ba ma mchis pa'o// 'gyur bam gyis
218b7(1): bgang lags pa de ni tha snyad ma mchis pa'o// tha snyad ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis myi khyab pa'o// bsam gyis myi khyab pa ga lags pa de ni bas nad tu ma mchis pa'o// ma ha nad tu ma
218b8(1): mchis pa gang la gang pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// dngos po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni 'byung ba'o// ma byung ba gang lags pa de ni 'phags pa rnams myi ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyang
218b9(1): cad myi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dbu mos dris pa'i yan thob shig/ rab 'byor kyis spras pa// 'di la brjod pa ci
219a1(1): yang byed de cang myi smra ba bde thob byed// spros pa myed pa'i chos 'di dag/ bu mos yongs su 'dri bar byed/ ji srid dngos po skye yod pa// de srid skyon gyi go par 'gyur// 
219a2(1): kyi byung pon pa da/ na can mengs byed pa na/ denas bus dris byed kyis byin pas//  lda pan phrul 'di skad ces sa/ cheng bldan 'a nas gru'i bcom ldan 'das kyis
219a3(1): gnas gan pa rnams kyi tshig tu bstand pa lags na/  sems la gnas te/ bsam gtan mdzan nas/ lend te sems tha mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad/ gal te rnams
219a4(1): gdas te thamam gtan mdzad na/ sems ni brjod dum mchis shing sbrus ste bu sen yang dag pa ma yin pa kun btags pa la dkas na/ ji sang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa ma mchis pas
219a5(1): gan te/ bsam gtan mdzad dam/  he/ semams ma mdzem pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad na nate phra dang shing dang rtsig pa dang / rdol ma bcogs pa byung ba dang / das
219a6(1): pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni sems ma mchis pa'i srad dur// tshe dang ldan pa nas gru yang ca kyi smra bar gyur dun
219a7(1): de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa 'i tshe dang ldan pa nam gru la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa nas gru bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ nam grus smras pa bu mo na de bzhin
219a8(1): gshegs pa'i yul 'drin/ de ni nyan thos rnams kyis bad nad par myi nus med/ bu mo s+t+wa~M smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nas gru chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang gzhan sa
219a9(1): pas mas kyis gzhan / ga ga tshas kyi phyongs gtan sags de 'ad du 'du de bzhi byed ni gnyis su mas de bas 'di da nyi
219b1(1): gags pa sa 'dzin nang ldan pas 'gags pad bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i myig can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan dpa lags na
219b2(1): kwa'i phyog gis dngos po gzigs su/ sha ngas pas mdzes pa gshegs gas te dngos po gzigs nan/ dag par lta bar 'gyur ro// mag dngos pom brjes drug
219b3(1): dbangs pa ma 'gags pa yang cang kyi smra bar byur to// denas pa na sa kun dga' bas napas bgags pa la 'din sa
219b4(1): sa 'ganas pa cu sa sa pa da ldan pas bgags pas smra zhum pa ni shes pa na ladus / 'di skye
219b5(1): rjeza/ den ma sus dem rkyen gyi/ sa byin 'am/  dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces mAn so// 'di skye che dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyo na bcom ldan
219b6(1): chog tu ba gdad pa len pa sa du som banyid da kyul / tshig 'byung ba// ka' nyi nang du bzhan do ni
219b7(1): dums kyi ma zhing bzad dum mchis denin pa'i rnam pa dashes shes par bgyi'am lags pa nas yi byinapa par shes pa'i
219b8(1): rnam sa gang lags pa de bgan du ma mchis canaji gi tshig 'thubyung brtananabacom ldan
220a1(1): kyis rngon rton pa yin gyi tshig 'brung rton pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pas de bas na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i mang du thos pa nyid ni rton pa ma lan
220a2(1): de nas mo dang ldan pa kun dga'o yang cad myi smra bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa
220a3(1): kun dgani za bu ma 'i dris pa'i san tho bshig/ ku dga' bos smras pa/ 'bru ma na pazhi dang bras pa 'di ste/ de ni smram tshom par byed kyi rus so bu ma ni sems dang bral
220a4(1): za'i mnyam pa nyid 'dri heslob pa rnams kyis ma yin na/ ji ltar bsta nad par bya ste/ chos kyi mnga' bdag de debazhin gshegs pa la zhu dgos pa'o// de nas bu
220a5(1): za drim byed kyis byed pas 'jas dpal gnon du byas su'adi saskad ces smras so/ 'das dpal khyod ni de bzhin na gas pas rab mo la mos pa'i byang chub sems da
220a6(1): rnams kyi mchog tu bganang pa lags na/ ci rten cing 'breld par 'byung ba zab pas khyod pa 'on te ngo bo nyid zab pas zab pas lal te rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab pas khyod rab
220a7(1): dani nid cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang rab pa'i chom gang yang ma mchis sode ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di ltar rtend cing 'bris par 'byung ba ni song ba ma legs 'ong ba ma lags
220a8(1): te/ rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni myig gi rnam pas shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa nasayid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis shes par bgyi ba ma lags shing gnyis su
220a9(1): ma chim sa kun su srung ba mtsham pa'i bud da pa'i kyi nying pa nyid padan ningab nyid gang song sus kyang zhag par gyi rlus // 'angasha dpal gyis pAs pa su mo ma
220b1(1): dan pa mas rab pas 'a ba ldan za/ bu ma dris phyed kyis byin pas smras palam dpal yang dag pa'i mtha' nim nas ma lags tede'i slad du rnam par shes pas
220b2(1): 'jam dpa ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa bu mo yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni dmyigs su myed pa'i tshig bla dgas so// bu mo dri ma myed kyis
220b3(1): byi pasu smra ma dpal byas dbyigs su ma mchis pa ni gang gicig dwags kyang ma lags te/ dmyigs su ma mchis bya ni cis drug so la mo yang dag par
220b4(1): 'das po lags so 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'di ci ltar gzhan dag la bsand par byabu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub
220b5(1): ni bag nang pa las yang dag par 'das pa lags te/ de ni brjod pas bstand par myi nus so// 'jas dpal yang tsang/ myi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma byed kyis byed
220b6(1): bya chub sems dpa' mthong ba da yodus 'din rigs kyi bu khyod 'din sa kyang grong / ma pa la
220b7(1): zung byed dam / khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang dag kho mo'i phyig 'i ma na sdang por 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i
220b8(1): 'am pa'o thos bsam par byan/ zhes gsungs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs sgyur mthong ba mdzad dang/ 'od ge chos kyi skud mthong bar bdad/ 
220b9(1): gzungs kyi skur mthong bar mdzadan/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis ni 'di skad du/ gang dge des gzugs su
221a1(1): mthong // gang dag dal smrar shes pa/ 'dun pa 'dod chags ldan pa ste// skye bo de dag myi mthong // zhes gsungs so// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi skur ma
221a2(1): bar mdzad pa na/ chos kyi sku ni baha nad tu myi nus pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni myig gi rnam par shes pa las yang dag par 'das pa ste/ blta bar myi nus pa'i slad du'o// 
221a3(1): mthong ba don yod kyang cang myi smra bar gyur da to/  byang chub sems dpa' rin po me tog gis smras pa/ mthong ba don yod bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig/ mthong ba don yod kyis spras pa/ bu mo ni dngos po mye nga/ 
221a4(1): pa 'dri he/ de bahand par myi nus so// bu mo dri ma myed kyis byin bAs sman padag ni dngos po 'am/ dngos po ma mchis pa myi 'dri'o// prag nad pa slobs la de nas sond cig/ mthong ba don yod kyang cang myi smra
221a5(1): ba che sa gang ba'i gter rnams 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ngas ba kho bos bsas par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de/ ci zang zing dang bcas pa sa pan 'dogs par mdzad dam/ 'ond te rang ring ma mchis pas phan rje
221a6(1): 'dogs pa mdzad/ gal te 'ang zing dang bcas pas phan 'dogs na ni/ byis pa so so skye bo'i phan 'dogs pa dang / bye brag ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byis pa zon
221a7(1): skye bo rnams kyi dga' ba ni zang zing dang bcas pa'i srad du'o// ji he zang zing ma mchis pas phan 'dogs par mdzad na/ zang zing ma mchis pa ni bsgrub tu ma mchis pa lags so// rin po che tog
221a8(1): cid byi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma phyed kyis byin bas/ byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyodan kyis 'di skad du/ gang gis grong khyer 'dzin sems
221a9(1): rnams kyi las kyi ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba gang yod pa de/ tshe 'di nyid la yang zhing chung ngu myong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu bsim par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pas las ni bsam gyis phyi
221b1(1): pa nyid du bgand to/ de ni khyod kyis bsam par myi nus so// gal te khyod na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro// wi he bsam par myi myod na myi mkhyen bzhin du mang po myong bar 'gyur ba'i las tshe 'di nyid la
221b2(1): yang zhing chung du myong bar ji ltar mdzad/ bdag po ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la bdam / po rnyed par 'gyur ro// gal te de ltar mdzad sa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka da 'gal bar 'gyur ro// ngan song spong gis smras pa/ kho ni smon lam
221b3(1): gyi dbang gis mang du myong bar 'gyur ba'i las nyung ngu myong bar 'gyur bar byed do// bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni smon lam gyi dbang gyis bsgyur du myi nus lags so// g.ye te nus par gyur dan/ 
221b4(1): sems cad thams cad mya ngan las pa zla'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i dgongs pa de smon lam gyi dbang gis ji skar myi 'grub ste/ rnam grangs 'dis na/ smon lam gyi dbang gis bsgyur myi nub par rig par bgyi'o// 
221b5(1): ngan mong spong ya cad kyi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu ma nga sa myed kyis byis pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di skad du gang
221b6(1): sa btan ma kyi grong khyod chen pong / skye bo'i tshogs pa mas cad kyi sgrib pa lnga po dganas par sel par 'gyur ba rnas pa des/ bu bsam par bya'o zhes gsung ba de ci ting nge 'dzin de bdag sa ngan las pa/ 
221b7(1): lags sam/ 'dod te gzhan la rag lam pa lags/ gas te bdag 'a rag sas pa lags na ni/ spyi 'thatha' chos can lags te/ ji lta khyod snyoms par bzhugs pas gzhan dag gi sgrib pa rnams rab tu zhi bar
221b8(1): yang te gzhan la ngag las pa lags na ni/ ting nge 'dzid de khyod kyi ma lags mo// kAng shod kyis lags pa des ni gzhanas phan par mdzad pa phyi spyod do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad sa
221b9(1): rwa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na sems can dag la sgrib pa rnams kyis gnod pa yang la mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad nam par sel pa yang cang kyi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo drim byed kyi
222a1(1): byin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du/ ji nas grong khyer de na sems can gang dag bcing ba dang / 
222a2(1): gsad par sgri ba 'di dag tha rad pa dang / 'jigs pas nyend pa rnams kyang 'jigs par byed pa thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de/ ci khyod kyi sbyor ba de le nad pa dang bcas
222a3(1): ba lags sam/ 'dod te me dang pa ma mchis pa lags/ gal te myor ba de lend pa dang bcas pa lags na ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang lend pa dang bcas pa lags te/ byis pa lo mo la skye bo rnams
222a4(1): dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// de skabs na de yang myi rigs so// ji nye sbyor ba de lend pa ma mchis pa lags na ni/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa lags te/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa la ni nye bar sgrub pa mchi sa/ 
222a5(1): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang cakyi smra bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa bzhi gas kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/ 
222a6(1): 'di skad ces smras so// gyen ras gzigs dbang phyug/ bu mos dris pa'i lan thob zhig/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ngas nazigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ bu mo ni skye bo dang 'gag pa myi 'dre ste/ rbahra/ 
222a7(1): de ni lan gdab par myi nus so// bu mo dri ma myed kyis byin pas smras pa/ spyan ras dbang phyug gang na skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa de na drib ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
222a8(1): gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ bu mo gang na skye ba myed cing 'gag pa myed pa de ni yi ge 'jug pa myed do// bu mos smras pa/ 'jug pa ma mchis pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la ni/ mkhas pa dag
222a9(1): ke dang 'jug pa myi tond te/ yi ge rnams la myi chags so// chags pa ma mchis pa ni chos kyi dbyings te/ de la ni rtogs pa bgyis pa'i slad du chags pa ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' suspyan ras gzigs dbang
222a10(1): phyag kyang cang myi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma myed kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa babregs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du gang gis grong khyer na skye bo'i tshog sa thams can
222b1(1): zan tshun du tshogs su bcad pa'i dbyangs dang / byams pa'i sems kyis smra bar 'gyur ba dang / spobos pa yang thob par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i don khyod kyis thob bya te/ 
222b2(1): bar bsgrub pa gang lags pa de/ ci rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lags sam/ 'ond te rgyu ma mchis pa las byung ba lags/ gal te rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lags na ni/ 'dus byas thams cad kyang rnam
222b3(1): rtog pam bskyed pa lags te/ de lta bas na rnam par zhi bar myi 'gyur ro// ci ste rgyum mchis pa las byung ba lags na ni/ ma byung ba la sgrol 'dogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa legs/ 
222b4(1): kyis smras pa/ bu mo sems can gang dag kho bo'i myig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad/ spobs pa thob par gyur da cig ces bya ba'i smon lam 'di ni dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ btab bo// bu mo dri ma myed
222b5(1): kyis byin pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sems bskyed pa gang gis smon lam btab pa'i sems bskyed pa de ma mchis sam/ 'ond te ma mchis/ gal te mchis na ni rtag par lta ba lags so// ci ste ma mchis
222b6(1): na chad par lta ba lags te/ de gsung na ni khyod kyi gsunganab logs pa lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa rdegs kyang cang myi smra bar gyur to// de nas bu mo dri ma myed kyis byin pas/ 
222b7(1): byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dong ba don yod la 'di skad me smram// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang da kho bo'i myig lam na sdang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag
222b8(1): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ci byang chub de mchis pa zhes brjod par bgyi 'am/ 'ond te ma mchis pa zhes brjod par
222b9(1): bgyi gal te mchis na ni rtag pa ste/ yod pa'i mthar 'dzind pa lags so// ji he ma mchis na ni chad pa de myed pa'i mthard 'dzind pa lags so// byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod kyis smras
222b10(1): bya/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' nan la shes kyi tshig bla dgas so// bu po drib skyed kyis byin pas smras pa thal gas skye bas rab tu bye bsags sam/ 'od kazhibs rab tu phye ba lags rnags te skye bas / 
222b11(1): gi stugs na ni/ rdul bzhin ma lags pa yid pa bgyid pa las byung ba 'dus byas su 'gyur te/ shes pa de ni byis pa rnams kyi lags so// ji he zhi bas rab tu bye ba lags na ni/ de la dmyigs pa sa ma ma mo/ 
223a1(1): gang la dmyigs bya de la 'di ni so so'i skye 'o zhe 'am/ nyan thos so zhe'am/ rang sangs rgyas so zhe'am/ byang chub sems dpa'o zhe 'am/ sangs rgyas so zhes rnam par rtog pa myi skye'o// de ci'i slad du
223a2(1): zhid/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rnam par myi rtog pa lags na/ byis pa sos so'i skye bo rnam sa'i byang chubs rnam par rton te/ mkhas pa rnams ni myi rtog pa'i slad du'o// byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dod ba don ro// 
223a3(1): kyang cang myi smra bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong khyer du 'jug par bya'i slar drong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ deng bu mo// 
223a4(1): dri ma myed kyis byin pa las chos thos pa gang yin pa 'di ni mkhas pa'i zas yin pa yin pas chog par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ chos kyi zas bza' bar bya'o// de nas bu mo dri ma myed kyis byin pas/ gnas rten rab 'byoran/ 
223a5(1): la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor dgang na 'a/ rdeg pa myed pa dang / gzhag pa myed pa de la khyod kyis ci zhig pa/ tsal bar sems btsun pa rab 'byor de dge slong gi tshul ni spros pa
223a6(1): ma mchis pa lags kyi/ spros pa la dga' ba'i ni ma lags so// btsun pa rab 'byor de dge sbyong gi chos ni / gnas pa ma mchis pa/ gnas par myi bgyi ba lags ste/ 'phags pa rnams kyi saspyod yul
223a7(1): ni myi 'khrugs pa lags so// bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o/ 
223a8(1): de nas nyan thos chen po brgyad po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpal brgyad po de dag dang / bram ze lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / bu mo dri myed kyis byin pa dang / rgyal po gsal brgyal dang / de las gzhan pa skye bo phal ze rtse
223a9(1): rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyinang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bu mo dris myed pas byin pas/ 
223a10(1): bcom ldan 'das la lan gor bskod ba byas so/ gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lja ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo spa da pa brdud nas/ tshigs su bca
223b1(1): ba'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// ting nge 'dzin stobs ldan grags pa mthal yas mnga'o// 'jig rten 'gon po bdud rtsi dga' thol dang/ mtshungs myed ye shes pade gshegs khyod la zhu/ byang chub sems
223b2(1): sa kyad/ a sa / sa las ts+tsha/ thags pa / 8/  kyi du gyu
223b3(1): sangs rgyas nor byig rlung ma na ma snya thorje// ting lan zhe 'dam pa ji ltar bsgom// mye'is rdzu 'phrul yobs ni ci stang thob// sems can rin cen rnams kyi spyod pa gsungs// gang gi sa dran dang rtogs dang / 
223b4(1): blo gros 'gyur/ spobs pa mdzes dang ldan pa gang gis 'gyur// gang dang rab tu ldan dang 'khor nang du/ snyan cing shin tu mdzes pa smra bar gyidaH// gang gis myi ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// dri ma ma mchis lnga'i
223b5(1): kyeg kyang bab// rgan ma ba pa lan sems tu la de/ rdzu 'bras kyis ni'i rnams brgyad yang ma ni// ji ga gyi gtong ba brtson par 'gyur// rtag tu rtsul khrims ma sang sadas
223b6(1): ga ba pon 'grum bsam gtan mkhas par 'gyur/ ga ges ba la yang jis shin tu 'artson// sangs kyi gnas ni'i ltar nam pa spangs nas// pad ma las ni ngag su rdzus te skye/  sangs rgyas
223b7(1): rnams kyi spyad sngar ma chis par bgyid/ bdag byed myong pa nyid kyi sgra yang brjod// jisar de med dga' dang phyi dga' mtshungs// sred pa spangs ga tha 'a zhe sdang mang / mthong bar myi sems dpa' ba'i sems pa bachis/ 
223b8(1): sems btod g.yo' ba ma mchis ri rab mtshungs// rnyed dang ma gzed grags dang ma grags dang / rgod dang smad dang bde dang sdug bsngal dang / ji skar 'jig rten chos rnams zil mnan nas// 'jig rten kun pa rnab
223b9(1): lta bur gyod/ nga'i ma mchis tshul 'chos g.yo' ma mchis// ji ltar rdul bral da rgyal rgyags pa spong // zhi dang rab tu zhi dang zhi gnas 'phon/ blo ldan ji ltar ye shes mchog tu 'gyur// chung sa bu dong mngar
223b10(1): la dga' ma mchis// ji ltar bas mtha'i las dpe mngon par dka'// rtag tu bya dang mtshungs shing zla ba 'dra/ ji ltar chos kyi no la dga' zhing mos// chu dang mtshungs shing sa 'am rlung dang mtshungs// mkham pa ji ltar me dang 'dra bA/ 
224a1(1): 'gyur// rtag tu ci yang ma mchis myi rtogs lags// mnyam pa nyid la dga' zhing nam mkhas mtshungs// ji ltar rtag tu chos ni spong myi bgyid// bdag 'dor myi bgyid chos mchog yongs su gtong // 
224a2(1): 'jig rten dag tu stond pa'i sems bskyed nas// ji ltar gnas te byang chub 'jug par bgyid// zhing gi bkod pa ji ltar gnas par 'gyur// dge 'dun dag par ji ltar 'gyur ba lags// ji ltar dus sum da
224a3(1): tu chos thos shing / ji ltar tshe ring sems can bde bar 'gyur// rtag tu sred pa 'gog pa'i pha rol de sond/ dgra bcom 'dul bar bden bzhi ji ltar mthong // sems can brgya dag byang chub 'jog bgyid par/ 
224a4(1): spyod cing rtag tu dga' mos ji ltar 'gyur// gang gis shinan tu mdzes par 'gyur ba ltar// rdzus te skye bar gang gis 'gyur// longs spyod che dang shes rab che// kun mkhyen rtogs par khong du chud// gang gis su
224a5(1): bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan// dpe' byad bzang po brgya bcu 'thob/ bsod nams kun la mkhas pa lags// spobs pa gang gis skye ba der 'gyur/ zhing ni ji ltar dag 'gyur lags// dge slong dge 'dun
224a6(1): phun sum tshogs// gang du de'i sa smon btab pa// der ni/ ji ltar skye 'gyur lags// tshe rabs dran par ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang 'jal da// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/ ngan
224a7(1): chos dang yang dge 'dun pa ni skyabs su mchi// sum dang srog ni gtong bgyid kyi// de dag chos ni 'dar myi bgyid do// byang chub spyad pa spyod pagyid cing / the tsom ma mchis ji ltar 'gyur// 'gyod pa thams cad spangs nas ru
224a8(1): srog chags rnams la chos kyang hond// khyod da la myi mkhyend cang myi mnga'// thub chen khyed ni thams cad mkhyend/ byang chub sems dpa'i dpyod gang lags// go rims bzhin du bas nad du gsol tu gsol// de skad ce/ 
224a9(1): g+ha mo la dang dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo brim phyed kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces bka' sa la to// / bu mo legs so legs so// bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'dis bu 'dri bar sems pa ni khyod yang legs so// bu ze
224b1(1): kya sheg sa ngam chub nam yid la chugag dang ngas bshad do// tsum dri ma byed kyis byin pas/ bcom ldan 'das la legs ma zhes gam khyad te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sang nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das/ 
224b2(1): / chub rgyang chubs pa dang tshas bzhi dang ldanan/ bdud 'dus par byed do// bzhi gang zhen/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dag byed pa dang / tha ma'i tshan yongs su spong 'dang / skye mom
224b3(1): zas dge 'angs pa 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sgrib pa skyed pa'i byams pa sgom pa he/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhin po de dag dang ldan na bdud 'dul bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces byas// phrag don kyi byas sa
224b4(1): 'i bya// skye ba zang thonage ba rnamams spyang // phyogs bathurnams su byams pa bsgom byas nang / bdud 'dir bcus nas byang chub dag par 'gyur// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chom pazhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam
224b5(1): mthams sa ba dag ge 'a'abar byed de// bzhi gang zhe na/  nad du smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / chos 'a'agrol mos pa dang / rnam la brtan pa dang / skye bo mang po byang chub pa yang dag par 'a'i nang bu dang / 
224b6(1): 'dug pa te/ bu zo byang chub sems dpa' chos pani phyi ga dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa dag ga yol ba khyod// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// ji skad stsal pa de bzhin byed/ 
224b7(1): mkhas pa zab mo chos la bzod// yi dam la yang shi nad tu brtan// dkar po'i chos 'dzud par byed// rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla myed le// skye bo mang po dga' bar byed// de ltar chos bzhi de dag gis// zhing
224b8(1): rnams bye ba g.yo' bar byed// bu po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas su myed pa rnams su 'ong zer dag gtor te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mar me sbyin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / 
224b9(1): sems can bag myed par gyur cing phyi khom par gyur da pa rnams kyi gan du song ste/ chos btond pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la rin po che'i dra ba 'gebs pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ 
224b10(1): sangs rgyargya bya zhing mtha' yas su byed pa rnams su 'oda'i bdag gtang // de la 'di skad ces bya ba/ 9/ sang me sbyin pas 'od rnams dag/ shad pa'i dus na dam chos yongs su 'dzin pa bag byed gyurd pa rnams la mchod sbyi
225a1(1): mdzod rten dag la rin chen drab 'bul// des ni bye ba bsam yas zhing 'gro zhing / byang chub sems dpa' 'od gzer gtong bar byed/ rog nas sems can bde dang ldan par 'gyur// mkhas pa bA myed byang chub do / 
225a2(1): tu gnyer/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ gzungs 'thob te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgyan sna tshogs gcing zhing dag pa sbyin pa dang / bu mo brgyan thams cad kyis brgyand pa ste/ 'dod pa rnams la sbyin pa dang / 
225a3(1): rgyun gyi chad par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags pa brjod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mang du gnas pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi pa de dag dang ldan na/ gzungs 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 
225a4(1): sna tshogs byin pas gzungs ni thob par 'gyur/ bslong ba rnams la bu mo brgyand te sbyin / rgyun myi 'chad par sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod// rgyal ba'i ye shes dond tu shes rab bsgom/ chos bzhi 'di dag gis ni
225a5(1): gzungs thob par 'gyur// bskal du pa brgyad yang thob pa chud myi za// phyogs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa gang 'chad pa/ de dag/ i cad dran pa'i stobs kyis 'dzind/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
225a6(1): dang ldan na/ ting nge 'dzind thob te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dza ra ba la yid byung ba mang ba dang / gcig pur kun tu dga' zhing mgul sa pa dang / brtson 'grus pa phams pa dang / las kyi mtha' zhin tu yo
225a7(1): su mthar phyind pa yin te/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ ting nge 'dzin thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sred pa'i 'gro ba kun la yid kyang byung / bse' du lta bur cig pu spyod la dga'/ rtag tu shin/ 
225a8(1): tubartson 'grus pa sems bya yin// de'i las brtag shin tu mtharang yang phyind na rtag tu chos bzhi dag la 'azhugs nas su// byang chub 'apyod pa zhi ba myur tshol byed// byang chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin la go 'ob// rgyal ba
225a9(1): rnams kyi spyod yul byang chub rtogs// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ rdzu 'phrul 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yang ba dang / sems yang ba dang / chos thams cad la mngon par zhend pa myed pa dang / khas
225a10(1): bzhinam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa nyid du byind kyis rlob pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ rdzu 'phru thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lus yang bu de bzhin sems kyang yang chos rnams kun la gnas
225b1(1): byed pa nyid// nam pa kha'i khams dang mtshungs shing 'dra nyid du/ khams pan pa dag byen kyis brlob par byed// chos bzhi 'di dag nges par zhen byas na/ blo ldan de'i sardzu 'phrul ma 'a' yas 'thab// skad cig gcig
225b2(1): pa ni dam pa stong du 'acwo sangs rgyas po baphrag ming pon pas kyang mthong/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mdzes par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khro ba sred de song ba dang / za ba dang / zhe sdang dang / 
225b3(1): bris pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma dzad rten 'phyag par mngon par dga' ba dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom las bsngags shing nur zhon legs par 'angs so zhes rtag su smra ba dang / chos smra ba rnams pa khrog nyed dang bral zhing / 
225b4(1): gi 'gras pa'i sems byed pa yin te/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ mdzes par 'gyu ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan la 'khro dang 'khond tu 'dzin myi byed/ nga rgyal rgyags dang / 
225b5(1): za ba zhe sdang bral/ thod pa myed la dga' zhing snyan par sma/ dgus pas rgyal ba'i mchod rten 'phyag par byed// de ni tshul khrims rnam drag rtag tu bsrung // de ni rtag tu legs par 'ongs shes smra// chos rnaMs
225b6(1): lan rinapa 'byed/ rnam sems ni rdo rje rab mtshungs/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' rtsom bzhi dang ldan / rtul skye skye bar 'jurate/ bzhi gang zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad pa'i caH
225b7(1): ra bzhugs pa byed du 'dug cing / me tog ud pa sa dang / pad ma dang / pad ma dkar po dag gis lag pa bkang ste// de bzhin gshegs na pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mngon par 'thor ba dang / 
225b8(1): phan pa'i dngom po mang zhing yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i ngang tshul can dang / gzhan dag gi skyon myi 'dzind pa dang / sa dge ba'i ma pa thams cad sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
225b9(1): tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa nye// bu ma byang chub sems dpa' chom bzhi' po de dag dang ldan na/ dus te skye bar 'gyur ro// des 'di skad ces byas/ sangs rgyas sku gzugs pad ma mchog bzhug byed du gzug/ su skyes
225b10(1): me tog lhag pa bkang gi 'bul bar byed/ pha ros dag sa dga' bskyed pa'i tshig kyang smra/ dga' bar byed la mngon par bapod kyi sun gyi 'dzid/  sems can kun la ya phan phyir bsod nams yongs su blo/ 'brus
226a1(1): man rnams kyisas rgyas byang chub sgrub bzhes// sangs rgyas gsungs pa mi yo tan 'ad bzhi bsnyen dan de// rgyal ba mchog nams drung du rgyas te skye 'a grung / bum byang chub sems dpa' chen
226a2(1): na na/  rgya pa #/ 'i ga da/ rnam pargyad pa tshur pa'i tshus can dang / gas pabyed pa mazas ma sug pa dang / mas pam gyu pa ma ca
226a3(1): yid te/ bu bo byang chub sems dpa' chom bzhi pa de dang ldan na/ longs pyod chen por 'gyur // de la 'di skad ces bya mo// nges pa brnyas pa myed par sbyin pa sbyin par byed// de ni dngos po kun la rtag tu 'dzi nang pa myed/ 
226a4(1): rgyas pa'i lezhes pachog sa mam pa baspyad byas / de'i phyi ba dang sangs da cer za than par 'gyur/ dad pa dang ldan par 'gyur na cag pa 'byed yul babyed/ ma ba das ga zung ni 'dzin pang yang gyi byed// ldan pa'i ma
226a5(1): babagatag su pa drang thur dpang des da de 'dir songs myed pa dpa po rnams dang ldan bu ma byang chub sems dpa' tshom bzhi dang ldanan shes rab cher por 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ cha ba la mengs myi byed pa dang
226a6(1): bzhi pa 'di na ga dang ldan rnam shes rab chen por 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// mkhas pa rnam yang ser sna yod myi byed/ myi mthun 'jug pa myed pas 'gyod pa sel da yang dag rab ldan gdams ngag gtodad par byed
226a7(1): rgyal ba'i gyod yul gang min zhing nyid bsgom// cham lazhi 'di dag nges par bsten byed na// rgyal bas bzhed pa'i byang chub myu nga tu mdzi/ sangs rgyas rjes su bstan la 'phu byas nas// rkang gnyis dam pa sangs rgyas / 
226a8(1): 'gyur ro/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos gzhi dang ldan na/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yu nod pa dang / kha tom la pa tshon pa rnams lung rjod pa dang / gdams ngag rjed nas yun ring bu lo nad te namal
226a9(1): 'debs pa la lung 'brog cing/ dran par byed pa dang / 'di ltar kun dga' ba'i tshig gis gzhan dag la rang ba nye bar sgrub pa dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las nges par 'byung ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob
226b1(1): 'thob gzhadadag mam sa dad pa dang / yongs su sdo las ba da pa ba ba nang ting 'dzin khyim ca nyid sa mkhams ca/ bu ma byang chub sems dpa' chos pani pa de dag dang ldan na/ tshe rabs dran bar 'gyur ro// 
226b2(1): rmel 'din ces bya ba/ sung ma das 'a don pa la drad bar byed// gzhan la yid su 'ong ba'i sgra yang sgrogs/ rtsu ba myed par chos kyang brjod par byed// ting nge 'dzi nadang bsgom mtshan ma legs par 'dzind// chos pan
226b3(1): 'dadan nges par gdang byas ra/  bcud ce ldan 'a char bas drang par 'gyur// bskal ya tshang phrag pasam pas rjes su dran// rnam par 'drend pa'i mchog nyid byur nga du thob/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang
226b4(1): snganan/ sangs rgyas rnams dang 'phrad pa 'thob te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos phyi spong ba dang / srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i grogs po rnams dang myi stend pa dang / srog gi phyir yang chom sA las sru pa rgya
226b5(1): sangs rgyas byang chub rgya ma spong myi byed de/ chos sprug la skur dpa yob myi 'debs// des pasdig pa'i grogs po rnams rnam pa ra spong // g.yel la skyed par rtag su sangs rgyas dran// chos pani
226b6(1): 'dzidan rnam mang na dadabyas na// bdeng gshegs rnams dang phrad pa des pa thaza// zla myed byang chul ma thob par dus // 'dren pa gang la bzhugs pa de de skye/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ skyes
226b7(1): bu chen po 'i mtshan sum bcur gnyis pod dag thob che/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rin po che sngar gyis 'thor da la dang / 'bru mar dri zhim po dag gis de bzhin gshegs pan
226b8(1): mchod den khru bar byed pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / sil snyan dang sna tshogs dbul ba dang / yid dbug yog 'khor gyis/ mkhan yo dang / slob dpom la bsnyen bkur byas pa rim 'gror byed pa se/ bu yo byang chub sems
226b9(1): dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ skyes bu chen po mtshan sum bcu pa gnyis dpa dag tho ba 'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mchod rtem la ni smar gyis dbyig rnams 'thor/ dri zhim 'bru mar rnams kyis mchod rnams/ 
227a1(1): khru/ spos dang me tog si la snyan sna tshogs 'phrul// yid du 'ong bas mkhan tho slo dpon pasten // de yi lum sum bcu rtsa gnyis 'tshan dang ldan// rab tu mdzes shing yon tan kun dang ldan// gang gis
227a2(1): shes rab mchog ldan rgyal mdzes pa// chos de dag gis skyes chen mtshan du 'gyur ro// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dpe' byad bzang po brgyad bcu dag thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ btand rgyu
227a3(1): tshigs chos kyi bas nang du 'bul pa dang / gzhan la hi sang byed pas myi skyo ba dang / chos smra ba la thab mo myi rgol ba dang / sems can rnams byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'
227a4(1): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ dpe' byad bzang po brgya bcu po dag thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ stan rgyu sna tshogs chos kyi bsta nad tu 'bul/ gzhan la hi tang byed pas skyo ba myed// chos smra ba la
227a5(1): khal mo long skye rgos/ sems can rnams ni byang chub 'dzin tu 'jug/ 'di bzhis lus la dpe 'byed pa zang po rnams 'di na de yis rnyed dka' ba byed/ yon tan 'di dag rtag tu bsten pas na/ byang
227a6(1): chub sems dpa' 'din brgyand par 'gyur// bu mo byang chupa sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ spobs pa 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'dzin pa dang / nyin mtshan
227a7(1): duphung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kha ton byed pa dang / sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'jig rten thams cad dang myi mthun pa/ skye ba skyed cing 'gag pa myed par nges pa la mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas
227a8(1): 'dzin pa dang / yus dang phrag dang yo byad rnams la myi sa ba he/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi da dag dang ldanan// spobs pa thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya sa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde sA da ne/ nyin mtshad rab/ 
227a9(1): shu 'don dpar byed// 'jig rten kun dang myi mthun pa'i// skye ba myed pa rab tu sgrogs/ mchog tu dka' ba rnyed thur da nas na/ sangs rgyas pas nad pa 'dzind par byed// sus dang srogs skyes par/ don byang chub sa ba/ 
227a10(1): khyed nga / ban pa 'di dag sen byas na// don spobs pa 'phel bar 'gyur// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jis rten kun/ sA tshogs 'phreng 'das mchim par byed// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldanan/ sangs rgyas/ 
227b1(1): kye nang yongs su dag pa thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ phrag dog myed pa dang / ser sna byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / 'khor ba dang 'dre ba myed pa te/ bu mo byang chub sems da'a' chos bzhi po de
227b2(1): dag dang lda na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'thob bo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan gyi rnyed pa la nam yang phrag dog myed// mthong nas dga' bar gyur da te ser sa myed// sems can kun la de'i sems kyang
227b3(1): zhabs gzong dang 'dra bar de ni yod myi byed/ chos bzhi 'dis ni zhing gi bkod pathob cing // myu rang tu byang chub mchog kyang 'thob par 'gyuras/ bumo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dge 'dun phum/ 
227b4(1): sum tshogs pa 'thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi 'khor myi 'byed pa dang / myi mthun pa rnams kyi sdums byed pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed du 'jug pas phan 'dogs pa dang / phra ma'i tshig yongasu
227b5(1): spong ba ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag da dang ldan na/ dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa 'thob bo// de la 'di skadri ces bya ste/ gzhan gyi 'khor ni nam yang yod myi 'byed// skye bo myi
227b6(1): mthun pa dag bsdum par byed/ lung nod kha ton byed la ya nga dag 'dzud// pha rol de dag la dbyen gyi tshig myi smra// tshig bzhi la/ de dag nges par bas nad byas na// dge 'dun rgya che rnam dag thob par
227b7(1): 'byung / de bas dge 'dun rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir/ mkhas pas chos 'di rtag tu brtend par byar/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' rtsom bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du sems dpa skyed pa dang bskye ste/ 
227b8(1): bzhi gang zhe na/ gzhan dag gi shes kyi khri dang rnyed pa la phrag dog myi bskyed pa dang / skrag pa'i bsam phra'i pha rol tu phyind pa drug po yongs su dag pa tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la son par khru
227b9(1): shes bskyed de/ tha na sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la yang banyi tang byed pa dang / shes kyi khe'i phyir tshul 'chos pa byed pa ste/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas
227b10(1): kyi zhing gang du sems bskyed pa der skye'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzhan la mchod pa mthong na phrag dog myed/ pha rol phyind pa dag pa yongs su tshol/ byang chub sems dpa' stond par rtag tu sems/ 
228a1(1): gas khe bde ba'i don du tshul chos myed// yon tan 'di dge rtag tu bsnyend byas na// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang de 'phrad 'gyur// zheng gang dag tu smon lam btab byas pa/ 'dod pa bzhin du
228a2(1): zhing der skye bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bu mo dri ma myed kyis byin pas 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar chos btags pa 'di dag bdag
228a3(1): gis yang dag par blangs te gnas par ma bgyis na/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'tshe zhing bzhes la/ chos kyang stond pa de dag thams cad bslus
228a4(1): par gyurd cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ bu mo dri ma myed kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bu me du 'di skad smra ba ni ngo mtshard te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
228a5(1): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrub dka' bar myi shes sam/ de de nas bu mo dri ma myed kyis byin pas/ gnas rten pa myelu 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa me'u 'gal gyi bu
228a6(1): chen po bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ ji ltar da ltar de ltazhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
228a7(1): pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba dang / je ltar btags pa'i chos 'di yang dag par blangs te/ gnas par 'gyur zhe na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des/ hong gsum gyi tshor chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnab pa drug
228a8(1): tu g.yos par gyur na cig/ sems can gal la gnod pa myed par gyur na cig/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta ji ltar btags pa'i chos 'di dag yang dag par blangs te gnas
228a9(1): bar 'gyur zhe na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des lha'i me tog gi char mngon par kha 'gyur cig// ma bkrol bar sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po smra 'byin par gyur cig/ bdag kyang bud kyi lus sa
228a10(1): gyur te/ skyes pa'i lus la su red cing lo bcu drug yon pa 'dra bar gyur da cig/ smon lam de skad btab sbyi na/ byeden pa'i bden pa'i byin kyi rlabs 'di byas ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la tong gsum byi ting cher
228b1(1): ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ ma dkrol bar sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya song gi sgra yang byung / sgra'i me tog gi char yang mngon par bab bo// bu mo drim phyed kyis byin pa yang bud myed kyi
228b2(1): gyi snang bar gyur te/ skyes pa'i dbang 'a thog nas/ lo bcu drug lon pa tsam gyi gzho nu 'dra bar snang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcwo
228b3(1): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar che ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la gnas pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal long
228b4(1): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rgyu 'di dag so sor yongs su rdzogs pas/ bu mo drim byed kyis byin pa 'di ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa/ 'di ltar mthu che ba lags so/ 
228b5(1): ldan 'das kyis bka' sa la ba/ me'u 'gal gyi bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras bzhin te/ dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi
228b6(1): byam nyid de na ga ce mdum pa mdzad pa de'i chi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nas kyi sgonas 'od zer kha dog du ma 'a dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste// sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shes dang / 
228b7(1): dul gyi kha dog lta bu dag 'byung ste/ 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu myed pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i
228b8(1): gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bstan las yangs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu gza dad nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lda ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga ya ba de logs su thal mo
228b9(1): sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ lha dang tshangs pa'i sgra dang myi mjed kyi bdag po'i sgra dang 'brug smra dbyangs ldan pa/ mgon po lnga sgra yid 'od ldan zhing 'dod chags zhe sdang nig
229a1(1): mdzad pa bo// gti mug spong ba 'jig rten dag na dka' ba bzang po gzhal yas skyed mdzad pa// stobs bcu yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba gang gi don tu 'od btang bas+ya nad tu graso lad// rIr+ya bcasra nags 'tshal bcas shing
229a2(1): chab dang bcas pa'i sa rnams rnam pa drug tu g.yos// lha rnams nam mkhar gnas shing lha'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char yang 'brebrasa?/ sreng ges dz+ra phra ma? pra gyos pa bzhin du khyod kyis mu sregs gzhan kun pha ma bar mdzad/ dga' bo gape
229a3(1): gi dond tu 'od kyi ltas 'di pa ha nad pa bka' saHpad gsol do/ nyi zla bye ba tong gi bod bkye ba dang glog dang nor bu'i 'od rnams dang / lha dang klu da gnod sbyin dge gi 'od rnams/ 'bar ba gang lags pa/ shag kya thub pa'i zhal nas dge 'i
229a4(1): dag pa'i 'od byung ba dang 'angs gyur da nas// 'od rnams thams cad mog sog bgyis te sangs rgyas 'a ni phyogs bcu napas su mdzes// khyod kyi sprin rnams par gyi mdzod su rab mangs dag nang dri ma ma mchis pa dang / 
229a5(1): 'bar zhing pad ma khye cha dang dung dang me tog kun da 'dra bas phyogs gsal brgya dad/ thams cad mog mog bgyid nas gdugs kyis srin bu me khyer bzhin/ du rgyal ba mdzes// myi'i seng ge thub 'di gang gi don chen bzang bor/ 
229a6(1): der 'gyur ba nod tu gsold/ de skad ces gas yod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' saH yad to/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis bu mo dri ma myed kyis byin pa 'di byin gyi brlab
229a7(1): gang gis bud myed kyi dngos po gyur na te/ skyes pa'i dbang po thob par gyur da pa mthong ngam// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bka' saHlad pa/ kun dga' nga po byang chub sems dpa' dri ma myed kyis byin pa 'di
229a8(1): kha na pa slang sa byed pa 'bum zab brgya phur / bla na gyud pa yang dag par 'gas pa'i byang chub kyi byed spyad de/ bzhas dpa grangs byed pa 'bum phrag drug bcur gyud nas/ phyim bu ma 'di la me gan nu zung na
229a9(1): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa de 'dra ba dag de/ byang chub pos
229a10(1): de dris byed kyis byed pa las rgyas kyi da ngag pa dadi dan ngos tu 'gyung ba/ dedam mi dang rnyanapa me bu 'gas kyi bri canams/ byang chub nyims dpa 'dris byed pas byin pa pa 'dzi na ces snamapo rinas kyi bu bya ga
229b1(1): yun ring du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir pyod pyod na/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis de'i tshe bud myed kyi dngos po ma bsgyur ba// byang chub sems dpa' dri ma myed kyis byin pas smras pa/ gnas rten mye'u 'gal gyi bu chen po
229b2(1): ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin na/ btsun pa khyod ci'i phyir skyes pa'i lus las myi bsgyur// gnas nyan me'u 'gas kyi bu chen po cang myi smra bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 
229b3(1): ra ba drim byed kyis byir pas/ be'u 'gas bye bu chen po ma 'di skad ces smras pad/ btsun pa le'u 'gas kyi bu chen po bud byed kyi lus kyis byang chub mngod par rdzogs par 'chang chub yang ma yin/ skyes bu'i lus kyis byang chub cwo
229b4(1): par rdzonas par 'chang rgya ba yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni ma skyes pa te/ de ni lus sam sems kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya myi nus pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa
229b5(1): 'jam dpas kyis 'di skad ces gsosod to// bcom ldan 'das 'di dkyang byang chub sems dpa' phyim byed kyis byin pa 'di zab mo sa mom pani mdzad lags mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bas 'da'/ 'dzi
229b6(1): smra dastsas kyi sem dpal nas bye kyi byed pa kye cas drug cu'i 'du sa par byan 'gyud do// nga pa nyid kyi nge la ning bsam/ 
229b7(1): myi skye ba'i chog la ba 'od pa bsgoms so// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag sum bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' thab mo'i tshul dang ldan pa rnams yang/ shes rib kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su dris so// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya
229b8(1): bcu la na bza' dang / zhal las kyi bkur mi byas mo// spobs pa rnam par nges pa yis nad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ya dayongs su dris so// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gapa gis tor gsum gyi hong chen po 'i
229b9(1): 'jig rten gyi khams gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'bul ba phul bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
229b10(1): mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyand tsam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu bton dam/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir de na
230a1(1): bsgrub pa 'di ni byang chub thob par byed pa'i phyir ro// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la bka' sa la da pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di cung shig/ chongs shig/ 
230a2(1): sgrogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu banyond cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos
230a3(1): kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mying ci lags/ 'di ci ltar bzung bar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka las ca lad pa/ 'jam dpal de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spobs pa rnam par nges pa bsand pa zhes bya bar zung shig
230a4(1): gzungs kyi rdo rje'i tshig ces bya bar yab zung shig/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang zung shig/ dri ma myed kyis byin pas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zug shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam
230a5(1): grangs 'di bas nad pa na/ lga dang myi'i skye dgu las/ srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgyad bcu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur rto// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang
230a6(1): chung sems dpa' spobs pa legs kyis 'di skad ces bka' samasad to// bcom ldan 'das byed chub sems dpa' drim skyed kyis byin pa lani srid cig na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rba
230a7(1): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa la dpa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' drim myed kyis byin pa 'di bskal dpa brgya stong phrag grangs myed pa bgrang ba las 'das
230a8(1): kha na/ sangs rgya kyi zhing nyan thos dang / rang byasangs rgyas rnams myed pa/ tshe'i tshad dpag tu myed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu myed pa dang ldan pa/ lnga'i longs spyod pas shi na cu lhag pa
230a9(1): dang ldan pa/ ma par dpag tu byed pa dgod pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bshad cing 'jos 'dris byed pa'i nan gi rgyas po zhe sa bya bar krung / 
230a10(1): de nas byang chub sems dpa' drim skyed kyis byim pas/ bcom ldan 'das las mngon suM du lung bstand pa thos nas/ dga' ba dang mchog tu dgal ba des tal bye ba phrag brgya bcu srid du no/ khal la mngon par 'phag ste/ 
230b1(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong 'od kyis khyab par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du rin po che'i gdugs chang dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi gong yod par byind kyis rlabs te/ rin po che'i gdugs des 'atong ga tu
230b2(1): gyi phong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khebs bo// / de sa yang nam mkha' de nyid na rdzu 'phrul dpag tu myed pa byas nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gda' ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed la btod cing phyag 'tshal te/ gi sang byas
230b3(1): nas nam mkha' de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan hor bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lha las mtshogs pa bram ze lnga brgya po de dag gis byab chul sems
230b4(1): dpa' dri ma myed kyis byin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yang mthong // lung bas nad de yang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' nas/ bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
230b5(1): ma s+ya rad pa btud nas/ sgra skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gang dag sangs rgyas gus mchis dang / gang dag sangs rgyas chos slad du// blo ni shi nang tu nges gyurd pa// de dag rnyed
230b6(1): mthong gyur na// bkra' myi shis zhes bgyis pa'i// tshig tu brjod pa gang mchis pa// btsun pa nongs pa bshags par bgyid// tshogs kyi rgyal po mchog gyur da pa// sangs rgyas gang dag ma mthong ba/ 
230b7(1): skye de dag gis nongs pa rnyed/ ka de dag kha zas ngan pa 'tshal// / dri myed byin pas mchod sbyin slad// bdag cag mgron tu bos par gyur da// tond pa'i nyan thos rnams mthong nas// ma gus pas ni sdod cing mchis// de
230b8(1): dag caka rnams kyis dris// khyod kyis 'drend pa gang na mthong // des spras bcas nas lo bdun na/ kho mos sangs rgyas mtshan thos mchil// de yis sangs rgyas bsngags med pa// de bzhin gzhan du myi 'gyur brjod// 
230b9(1): de'i tshig thos bdag cag kun/ byang chub mchog tu yang dag zhugs// bdag cag sngon gyi bsod nams dang // sangs rgyas zhes pagyi spras bskul bas// shag kya seng ge'i zhabs la ni/ phyag bgyi slad du ldags
231a1(1): pa sags/ thogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong phyag bgyis// chos kyi dam pa thos par gyur// rkang gnyis dam pa 'di mthong bas// bdag cag sdug bsngal kun las grol / skyob bzhig kya ses
231a2(1): ge ma// chos gang bshad pa mdzad pa rnams// sangs rgyam chos kyi don slad du// bdag cag de la slob par bgyid// sangs rgyas chom thob pa kyi slad du// byang chub spyod pa thob gyur nas// bdag cag yang dag
231a3(1): nan tan gyis// spyod pa de la bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang dang // lam dang sgo yang bsaha nad pa la/ nan tan gyis ni gnas par bgyi// 'jig rten rnams kyi mchod rten 'gyur// de dag sna
231a4(1): ba'i bsam mkhyend nas/ thub pas de che 'dzum pa mdzad// thub chen lung bas nad mdzad gsolang zhes/ sangs rgyas sta ni kun dgas zhus// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' sa la to// bram ze lnga brgya
231a5(1): 'di dag dang / bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de dang / de kun bskal pa gcig gi/ che// rnam par 'drend pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// sangs rgyas lnga brgyanam la// tshe rabs snga mar mchod byas pa// de nas phyin chad
231a6(1): spyod che yang // sangs rgyas bye ba mthong bar 'gyur // bskal pa bye ba brgyabacur ni// de dag ngan 'gror 'gro myi 'gyur// de dag bskal pa re / la yang // sangs rgyas bye ba mthong bar 'gyur// de dag skas#
231a7(1): pa gcig de la// rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gyur te// 'od ces bya ba'i bskal pa gcig la// tshangs pa'i sgra zhes bya bar 'gyur// de dag tshe tshang mtshungs gyur te/ bskalan pa bye ba brgya bcu thub/ zhing mtshungs dge 'dun
231a8(1): mtshungs gyur na te/ dge ba slong bye ba brgya bcu yod// sems can rnams kyi don spyod cing // chos 'di la yang s+yad byas nas// de dag thams cad mtha rad kyis su// mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba tho'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
231a9(1): bka' sa lan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa legs pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' drim skyed kyis byin pa dang / 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa dang / bram ze de dag dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / nyan thos chen
231a10(1): ba de dag dang / skra dang myi dang / sna ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par byed do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i
231a11(1): chos kyi rnam grangs kyi le'u song phrag brgya pa las/ drim myed kyis byin pas zhus pa zhes bya ste/ se'u sum bcu phra gsum pa/ rdzogs sto/ na/ rgyag gyi mkhan ma 'dzin gyi tra dang / su ren dra ba de dang / nu tre rkyen
231b1(1): oMd+hi b+han de ye shes sngos bsgyur da cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ bam po gnyis dang shu log lnga bcu// // / 'phags pa dkon mchog b.legs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnang grangs le'u hong phrag brgya pa lam
231b2(1): le'u sum bcu bzhi pa ste/ yon tan rin po che shi nang tu rgyas pa// bam po phyed do// // rgya gar skad du/ a r+ya gun rang nas ba ku su myi ta/ prad tshan ma swa tA yU na pu tra/ bod skad du
231b3(1): 'phags pa yon tan rin po che me tog kun tu brgyas pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
231b4(1): 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong gnyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub stong phrag mang po rnams thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor de nyid du/ byang
231b5(1): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ma gong byer yangs pa'i 'i byigan du yin ca gi can mo tog kun su rgyas pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dus par gyur te 'dug so de pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa len ma sa
231b6(1): nam tas kun rgyal pa 'azhan las langs te/ thags tha pa cis tu skyes nanas/ sum mogasas pa'i skang sa la 'jugs te/ los na 'das gas sa de lags su pas mo kyang pa btud dang/ ba
231b7(1): ma ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolan to// gal te zhus nas/ uH sung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye ba gnang na/ btsun pa 'acom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
231b8(1): kun na bzhi @/ pa gsa' #dang / sra dan cad kyi / sa kyad byam
231b9(1): 'am par byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu brgyas pas/ com ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gam ma to// bcom ldan 'das dgra pa 'dzig rte bye khasan gan dag / yangs
231b10(1): rgya batsham dran 'ad bas 'jugs te// yon pa parnas pa de rnams kyi ra ba can/ rigs kyi bu'am gas kyi num mya bu ba byed pa pa dag par zhes pa'i bya du sa dzad ba pags pa 'tsha rgyab 'phra
232a1(1): bzhugs lams pa de skad ces gsayod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin cen me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' sam med do// yon tan rin cen mye hod kun
232a2(1): tu rgyab pa sems so// legs so// yon tan chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa khyod da ltar dang ma 'das pa'i skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la 'de' ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs che ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / 
232a3(1): dang skye rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di zhu par sems pa ni yon tan rin cen me tog kun tu rgyas pa khyod yang legs so// de'i phyir yon tan rin cen mye tog kun tu rgyas pa khyod legs par rab tu
232a4(1): nyon la yid la lung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes zhus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin cen kye tog kun tu rgyas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar nyan pa/ 
232a5(1): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' saH yad to// yon tan nan can mye tog kun tu rgyas pa shar phyogs na/ chos thams cad kyi yon/  nu bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs
232a6(1): pa de ni rgyas pa thams cad kun nas sdud pa zhes bya'o// de nas sems can rnams kyi tshe ni dpag tu myed do// bcom ldan 'das de'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor dpag tu myed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/ 
232a7(1): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin ce na dpag tu byed pa bkod pa'i gtsu ra brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu de'i mtshad can 'dzidad pa'i rigs kyi bu lam rigs kyi bu mo dang pacan ri bskal dab stong dran/ 
232a8(1): drug bcu'i 'khor ba bsnyil bar byed do// che dzes nas kyang sgrib pa myed par rtonod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu rnams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spobs pa nye/ 
232a9(1): mar bsgrub pa ma da/ rnam me dang pa na pag sa yang byed par 'gyur ro// de la 'di nad ces bya ste/ byi gang sangs rgyas pacan 'di 'arjod byed pa/ del yon tan 'di rnams sru tu 'byung / de yang bas ldan pa nan/ 
232a10(1): yang 'thung // del pa byed byang chub dga' ma yin/ ga yon tan rin chen me tog kun dbu rgyas pa/  byenas na son tan da can ne no pa'i 'di rten gyimam sa na/ de bzhi gshegs pa na/ tshal ba yang dag par rdzo
232b1(1): sangs rgyas yon tan ri ni dpal gyi bkod pa'i gzil brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa yang yod do// bskal da pa de ni yon tan brgya nad pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
232b2(1): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin cen dpal gyi bkod pa'i gzi' brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu de'i mtshan 'dzind pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can ni/ tshe rjes ma thag tu nyi ma'i dkyil
232b3(1): 'khor mtha' snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dpag tu myed pa bkod pa yang yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur ro// che rjes ma thag tu skyes bu mchen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis thob pa
232b4(1): 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du smon lam 'debs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba cig gis thogs pa'i bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ 
232b5(1): spobs pa rgyun gyi rgyad pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ myi gang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'di brjod byed pa// de la ting nge 'dzind pasam yas te/ skye zhing / sum bcu pa gnyis mtshan ldan lus thob sa
232b6(1): ni byang chub bye ba cig pags 'gyur// yon tan ran cen mo tog kun su rgyam pa nub phyogs na mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad dang bral ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
232b7(1): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal zhe ces bya ba zhig/ das mtsho zhing bzhes pa yod do// bskamad pa de ni shag kyi mngon par mdzes pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/ 
232b8(1): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal de'i mtshan 'dzind pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can ni mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par myi
232b9(1): 'gyur ro// drug gis ma yin/ chus ma yin te/ skyes kyang 'chi ba'i dus byed par myi 'gyur ro// rdzus te skye bar yang 'gyur ro// tshorjes ma thag tu shugs brgya ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// de
232b10(1): 'di skad ces bya ste/ phyi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di brjod pa byed/ 'di la spyi de'i lus skyes skye 'chi zhing / mtshon gyis myin la chus sbyin dug gis byin/ de ni rdzus te skye ba khonar 'gyur/  yon tan rin cen me tog sung
233a1(1): rgyam zas kyang phyogs kun pa dang / dus dang thal pa zhes bya ba rten kyi nga da' zhi shegs pa dgra tsam tha yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thopa pa dang ga su byed pa zhes bya
233a2(1): den pa'i blo zhes bya ba zhig da skar bzhugs tes tsho zhing bzhes pa yod de/ bskal pa de ni grags pa chen po 'and pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs kyi
233a3(1): spobam pa dpag tu myed pa bkod pa yang dag par spyod pa'i blo de'i mtshan 'dzind pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad/ 
233a4(1): du rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ro// zad myi shes pa'i rnam tog ces bya ba'i gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ba nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya gi
233a5(1): bar du yang 'gyur ro// ngan song gsu po rnams su skye bar myi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa 'apyod pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang / gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der ngan song du skye ba'i sems can
233a6(1): rnams yongs su tha dad par byed do// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya nga chub las phyir myi ldog par yang 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// myi gang sangs rgyas mtshan de brjod byed pa/ de'i yon tan
233a7(1): bgrang bar myi nus shing // de ni byang chub thob par the tsom myed// de la the tsom skyed par gzungs skye'o// yon tan rin me tog kun tu rgyas pa/ sher lho'i 'tshams kyi phyogs na/ shi nad tu mdzes pa bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khas
233a8(1): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug stong bsgrags pa spa skad kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig da skar bzhugs te 'tsho zhes pa med do// bskas pa de ni yon tan 'byung ba 'am
233a9(1): bya/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs par dgA bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug meng bsgrogs pa'i sgra skad kyi rgyal ba de'i mtshan 'dzi nad pa'i rigs kyi bu las rigs kyi bu mo dan pa cad don/ 
233a10(1): dzem sa thag tu phyi 'jigs pa bani thob par 'gyur // rdzu 'phrul phyin 'am pa zhi thob par 'gyur / byam sa mtshan po dang / dring byin ma thub par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rgyachis ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pas
233b1(1): 'grang sa/ dban da gshegs pa med pas byed kyi sa sa rgyas kyi zhing ga son tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba des bu thob par 'gyur ro// bud byed kyi mongs nas smras pa'i lum thob par 'gyur ro// des 'di da ces bya ste/ gang zhig rgyas
233b2(1): macan 'di 'dzidid byed par// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'a ga'ang/ bams kyis phye ma tha rtag tu thob par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyam mang po mtha// yan tan rin cen ma tog kun tu rgya pa/  rur 'jam kyi
233b3(1): bko pa dpag dzu su byed pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'angs na/ de bzhi gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser mchog 'dod pas zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing zhes pa yod do// bskas pa de ni chos thams cad yang dag par
233b4(1): skyed pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser mchog 'od dpal de'i mtshan 'dzind pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu dad pa can de ni mtshan thos pa des pahA/ 
233b5(1): byas bcom ldan 'das bye ba phrag dgu mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// sems tam thams cad mchog tu 'gro bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind thob par 'gyur// gang gis na sems can thams cad mchog tu 'gro bar byed ce
233b6(1): gyi khams na/ sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad bde ba dang ldan bar 'gyur te/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas yid 'ong gi sangs rgyab kyi zhing na/ semasas
233b7(1): rnams gcig tu bde ba dang ldan zhing / sems can ngan song du skye ba thams cad yongs su tha dad par 'gyur te/ de dag de dag nas yongs su gros nas/ sna dang myi'i lus thob par 'gyur zhing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa
233b8(1): 'gyur ba bzhin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gser mchog 'od dpal gyi mtshan 'dzind pa// de la gzi' brjid dpal mdog stobs dbang po// tshe rabs kund tu rnyed par dka' ma yin// de la blo thogs myed pa mtha' yas
233b9(1): 'gyur// yon tan rin cen me tog kun tu rgyas pa/ nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs na/ sdig pa dang bral ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi'i' brjid rgyal po rna gang dpal
233b10(1): snang zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te mtsho zhing ba zhes pa zhig yod do// bskald pa de ni khyim rgyas pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi' brjed rgyal po rnam
234a1(1): ha~M/ mang dpas sngang de'i mngan 'dzi da 'ami rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni/ me dzes ma lag tu srubs pa dpag tu myed pa bkod pa zhes bya ba 'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// tshegs chung dus de bzhin gshegs pa
234a2(1): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu byed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'dzind par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya bcu'i chos sonod pa yang thos par 'gyur 'dzind par 'gyur ro// de la 'di
234a3(1): skad ces bya ste/ gang zhig rgyal pa'i mtshan mchog 'di 'dzind pa// tshe dpag myed kyi sangs rgyas zhing dudade// de ni tshe dpag myed sngan chos shes 'gyur// skye gcig thogs pas byang chub rdzogs 'chang rgya// yon tan
234a4(1): rin cen mye tog kun tu rgyas par// byang chub 'tshams kyi phyogs na/ mya ngan thams cad las rgal ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ bskal pa bye ba
234a5(1): grangs myed par byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te mtsho zhing bzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni spobs pa bkod pa zhesabya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
234a6(1): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa grangs myed par byangachub yang dag par bsgrubs pa de'i mtshan 'dzind pa'i rigs kyi bu 'ama'i gas kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni/ tshe rjes ma thag tu rnam pa
234a7(1): drug bcu dang ldan pa sgra dbyangs kyi spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya bcu la dge ba'i khya ba bskyed par 'dzind par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya bte/ sgra dbyangs yan lag drug pa
234a8(1): phun tshogs ldan// de ni kund tu shes pa 'ang pha rol phyi nad// rgyal ba bye ba brgya bcu mchod byed pa'i// bsod nams gang yin bsam yas des thob 'gyur// yon tan rin cen me tog kun ta tu rgyas gasteng gi phyogs na
234a9(1): yon tan dpag tu myed pa'i gzi'i brjid kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang po dang / nam mkha' nges par bsdogs pa bkod pa'i 'od ces
234a10(1): bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te mtsho zhing bzhes pa yod do// bskal pa de ni tshad myed lend ces bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser ba zang po dang ni mkha'
234b1(1): nges par sgrogs pa bkod pa'i 'od de'i mtshan 'dzind pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni// tshul khrims kyi phung po dpag tu myed pa yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzind kyi phu pa po dpag tu med pa dang / shes
234b2(1): rab kyi phung po dpag tu myed pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dpag tu myed pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dpag tu myed pa yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// sa nas sa yang thob par 'gyur ro// 
234b3(1): tshig bzung bar 'os pa nyid kyang thob par 'gyur ro// spobs pa bu la myed pa phun sum tshogs pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// myu rad tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
234b4(1): rgya bar 'gyur ro// yi ge dang brda'i sgra yang thob par 'gyur ro// rigs mthon po dang / rigs chen po yang thob par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga yang thob par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro// 
234b5(1): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang thob par 'gyur ro// / de la 'di skad ces bya ste// gang zhig rgyal ba'i mtshan mchog 'dzin byed pa/ de'i yan lag brgyad dbyangs phun sum thob// de ni
234b6(1): sangs rgyas bral bar ba gyi skye/ byin gyi thogs byang chub 'chang kyar la // yon tan rin cen me tog kun tu rgyam ba// lan na na 'dad pa byed pa nyid la dga' ba'i 'jig rte byin
234b7(1): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par 'phrul ba'i gser brjid kyi 'od ces bya ba zhig dasang bzhugs te mtsho zhing bzhes pa 'od do// ban ma das
234b8(1): rten le shes kun nas srung sa nas byar// brtsam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ches thams cad kyi tshul la nas par 'phrul ba'i ga ri'i 'jid kyi 'o di mang na
234b9(1): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mdod pa can don/ medzes ma thag tu sangs rgyam 'odas su grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungam thob par 'gyur ro// skye ba cig gis thogs pa'i blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu
234b10(1): pa brdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i chos pa rtand pa yang thos par 'gyur ro// thos nas kyang thams cad kyang kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya byed
235a1(1): sangs rgyas mtshan 'dzind sangs rgyas bye ba phrag/ dgu bcu rnams kyi chos pas nad thos 'gyur zhing // skye ba cig thogs bla na myed pa'i/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'gyur// de nas
235a2(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin cen me tog kun tu rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin cen thams cad dang ldan pa'i spobs pa'i skad kyis ka zung ma thob par 'gyur ro// 
235a3(1): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya bcus/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog pa'i sa thob bo// / lha dang myi'i skye dgu sum khri ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sos
235a4(1): bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' sarba lad nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin ce na kund tu rgyas pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / myi dang
235a5(1): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do// 'phags pa dkon mtsho gu ba legs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phra
235a6(1): brgya pa las// yon tan rin cen me ton kun tu brgyas pas zhus pa'i le 'u zhes bya ste// sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho// // phya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin myi tra dang / brang
235a7(1): nya bar ma dang / thu chen rgya mtsho ba pan de ye shes sde la sogs pas bskud cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa/ shu log brgya bzhi bcu/ bas po byed// 
235a8(1): / 'phags pa dkon mchog 'phags pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u tong phrag brgya pa las// le'u sum bcu lnga pa ste ta/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis myi khyab pa btan pa/ bam po dang po'o// 
235a9(1): rgya gar skad du/ a bya ma can tu bud d+ha bi zhi ya ning de sha na ma ma hA ya na mu tA/  bod skad du/ 'phags pa lnga'i bu dpas bzangs kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba zag pa chen po'i mdo'/ sangs rgyas dang / 
235a10(1): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sa phyag 'tshal ma// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal mgon myed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gong du
235b1(1): tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na pyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / gnas ka pad ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang thabs gcig go/ 
235b2(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong bums yongs su bskord te mdun gyis bltas nas chos gtond to// yang de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzho nur gyu da pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur dko 'dug go// lha'i bu dpal
